name: The Emperor Penguin Keita
description: Keita, an intrepid emperor penguin, gets lost during his migration and begins an extraordinary adventure on the ice alone.

name: The Dungeon Vendor
description: Travel to dungeons. Meet new heroes. Craft new weapons. Collect the loot. You are The Dungeon Vendor. The world has become a dark place and heroes are answering the call. It is time for you to help them by creating powerful weapons… for a tidy profit of course.

name: Shh! This is a mystery game! But watch out for spoilers
description: Reasoning... It's annoying.... I want to go home and play with Sara...❤ So please help me......

name: Shirime: The Curse of Butt-Eye
description: In Shirime: The Curse of Butt-Eye you find your missing girlfriend Sharon in Shirime Forest, stalked by the malevolent yokai Shirime. Collect pages to uncover the mystery, but beware: every page increases the intensity of Shirime's pursuit. Can you survive and unravel the truth?

name: Story of Animal Sprite
description: Story of Animal Sprite is a casual merge game where you will restore the homeland for cute animals by building various fancy structures.

name: Starryard
description: Welcome to Starryard, an adrenaline-packed space flight shooter. In this game, you will play the role of a pilot of a spaceship, maneuvering the spaceship to shuttle between the stars, and at the same time need to defeat the enemy in fierce battles.

name: Sorcerers Summit
description: An army of contraptions swarm the skies, and it is up to you, a lone sorcerer to defend the castle wall. Let None Pass! Move quickly, dash quicker, and bam, boom, blast them out of the skies with your magic. See how long you can last in this simple and stylish score attack game.

name: Somnus
description: Somnus is an action-packed dungeon crawler game where players embark on a perilous journey to defeat an ancient evil that poisons life underground. With cool pixel art and challenging gameplay, Somnus is an exciting adventure for gamers.

name: Shooting Saucer
description: A flying saucer chases you all over the galaxy. Run away, defeat enemies, and evolve to avoid getting abducted

name: Strip Fighter Zero
description: The bawdy spoof filled origin game of the "Strip Fighter" series of 90's style 2D fighting games finally hits the scene! An underground fighting tournament filled with deadly fighters and martial artists. Their fierce battle for supremacy is about to unfold!

name: Super Death Game Show! VR
description: How did this happen? It seems that future TV shows have gone as far as they can go. Incredible cash prizes if you complete your mission, but if you fail, you'll have to go to....... We bring you the most psychotic and crazy VR experience.

name: Sword Hero
description: An immersive fantasy survival game A thrilling adventure A powerful flying sword A bunch of skills with different functions Kill all evil

name: Swipe Tennis
description: Swipe Tennis is an immersive sports game that offers players an opportunity to test their mouse skills by becoming a tennis champion

name: Superior Crack Relatives
description: Superior Crack Relatives is a meme, couch-based multiplayer fighting game. Choose from a variety of balls and battle it out with up to 4 players in online multiplayer. Enjoy a variety of maps and characters, as you battle it out to be the ultimate champion.

name: QChat
description: Welcome to the mainland of Zelasda, where you can play the role of a survivor or use various props to evade the pursuit of regulators, crack the cipher machine, and escape from the manor to win!!!

name: Puzzle Panic Island
description: Puzzle Panic Island is a fast paced, skill-based match 3 Puzzle Platformer. You Control a character who must survive the Puzzle Blocks falling on their head and then Match them up, while also avoiding the Hazards they carry within! (Mostly Dinosaurs.)

name: Plasma Drone
description: "Plasma Drone" is a dynamic action game where you must fight to survive against waves of enemies. By upgrading your drone and weapons, you can effectively eliminate the enemy forces. The game offers 20 levels and a survival mode, which requires speed, precision, and strategy to survive.

name: Rescue Agency: The Kidnapper of Happiness
description: Rescue Agency combines the best elements of strategy and farming with storytelling and exciting missions. This is a secret, unknown world of adventure and magic! You have to go to the mysterious country to save its inhabitants from the insidious Kidnapper of Happiness.

name: Rise of Gun
description: Rise of Gun - immerses you in a world of zombie apocalypse as a gun store owner. Buy parts, craft, sell, upgrade your store and hire workers. Help to humanity survive

name: Rise of the High Elf King: A Legacy of Blood
description: Take on the role of our protagonist in his epic rise to power to become High Elf King in this 2D side scroller set in a world of magic and fantasy.

name: Role Model AI
description: Rolemodel.AI is a platform for creating personalized AI avatars that enhance personal growth and productivity. Customizable avatars can be experts in various fields, including game development and nutrition. The platform uses cutting-edge technology to revolutionize our interaction with technology.

name: Root: The Underworld Expansion
description: Conquer new battlefields as you journey into the Underworld of Root!

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Easter Extravaganza
description: 1 Brand New Table with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Easter themed table with mobile bunny targets.

name: Sex Tonight
description: Sex Tonight - is the simplest 2D puzzle that you will remember with its hot images.

name: Scroter
description: Scroter is a fast-paced physics-based fighting game where you battle it out as bouncing balls collecting powerups to gain an advantage and trick your opponents. Will you get the crown?

name: SimPoly Drive
description: Welcome to our open-world transportation strategy game! Choose from a variety of vehicles to transport goods and people across a dynamic landscape. Level up and increase your income as you explore the world. Become the ultimate transportation tycoon in our thrilling new game!

name: PoPuP
description: Puzzle Flatformer Game Adventures Over Obstacles at a Paper Amusement Park

name: Merging Cubes
description: Unique puzzle game absolutely addictive gameplay. Puzzles with thousands pieces! Hardcore challenges and infinite fun!

name: OrbRider
description: OrbRider makes indoor cycling fun! You ride and explore up to 7 different tracks and biomes as you take on multiple challenges, gather resources, and unlock new and undiscovered areas. Personal ANT+ USB hardware dongle and ANT+ enabled speed sensor or smart trainer equipment required.

name: One Soul
description: Explore dark dungeons. Wield your sword to attack enemies. Raise your shield to block attacks. Find keys to unlock doors. What will you discover?

name: Nimblefoot
description: Nimblefoot is an action-packed parkour game where players must outrun and outsmart primitive hunters in pursuit. In Nimblefoot, you'll need to use all your skills to avoid obstacles and fend off monsters lurking in the forest.

name: Oh! Fuse Box
description: This is a new remake of a puzzle game that connects pipes.

name: My Dear Dad
description: Xiaoqian's father dragged his exhausted body home, only to find that his house was engulfed in flames. In order to save his daughter, he rushed into the scene of fire, but fainted the moment he saw her. When he woke up again, he found himself in a strange place, and his daughter Xiaoqian was missing...

name: Multiplayer Shooter FPS
description: Multiplayer Shooter FPS is an advanced multiplayer first-person shooter game.

name: Monster Girl 1,000
description: Embark on a journey across Elysium, battling fierce foes and exploring mysterious lands. Engage in over one hundred steamy encounters with monster girls while uncovering a mysterious plot spanning millennia. Get ready for an unforgettable journey filled with action, adventure, and romance!

name: Pactum + Episode 1
description: Explore all the different routes of Pactum! Try to discover more about what really happened. Learn more about each character by picking between some... story-changing choices!

name: Peace Is Your Destiny
description: Peace is Your Destiny is a relaxing trip across an everlasting and colorful ocean. Clear islands by rolling your cube to match colored tiles. You will uncover surprises along the way towards a calmer and chill mindset. Its will Remove your anxiety and you will enter the world of Peace.

name: Phantom-OS
description: Phantom-OS is a physics-infused strategic hacking simulator where you will put your skills and wits to the test.

name: Planet Zoo: Tropical Pack
description: Give a warm welcome to the Planet Zoo: Tropical Pack! Adopt and care for five incredible new animals commonly found in tropical rainforests around the world.

name: Knights and Goblins
description: Knights and Goblins is a deck building card game. Build and play your deck against the computer. Win challenging opponents, get new cards to improve your deck, and design your own unique card. Will you manage to win all rounds and be the new champion?

name: Kill Your Shapes
description: Kill Your Shapes is a third-person shooter roguelike set in a world where reality and creation has been simplified down to shapes. Kill the enemy shapes and get new items and abilities. There are several levels and bosses to beat.

name: Kagura Survivors: Endless Night
description: Something is wrong in the Kaguraverse. An anomaly is creating tears in space-time and causing parallel worlds to converge! It falls upon Kagura-chan, the vessel of the Goddess's will, to get to the bottom of this crisis and return order to the various universes.

name: Irradiant
description: Silence the shrine. Irradiant is a small score-attack action game by a solo developer, where you're faced with destroying mischievous spirits bewitching a shrine as fast as possible.

name: Inziva
description: A visual novel about you. Yes, you. "inziva" examines talking with your alter egos about your depression and traumas.

name: Lambda Spellcrafting Academy
description: Develop magical programming abilities while building spells. Lambda Spellcrafting Academy is a card-based puzzle game where you build spells (programs) to solve puzzles. Fun for complete beginners or professional wizards.

name: Landfall Archives
description: Break into the Landfall Archives to steal and play previously unreleased games, demos, interactive slide shows, and even an unreleased version of Totally Accurate Battle Simulator from 2017!

name: League Funny
description:
A battle royale game with MOBA gameplay and customizable characters based on KOL internet celebrities. It was released for April fools by the Taiwanese website League Funny, or Game Smash, which is a social media site and video platform originally focused on promoting e-sports communities and discussion.
The game was available for a month before going offline but may be back next year according to the updated trailer description.

Thrilling battlefield, spectacular fights! With numerous unique and stylish characters, the 'Game Brawl' is about to bring you an unprecedented fighting experience!!

name: Long Truck Simulator
description: Long Truck Simulator is an exciting and challenging game that puts you in the driver's seat of a powerful long-haul truck.

name: Lovelorn Sanatorium Ⅳ
description: This is a spoof plot puzzle game. Click the dialogue to advance the plot. There are many puzzle-solving levels in the game. You can find props by exploring and solve puzzles according to the game prompts.

name: Magic City Detective: Rage Under Moon - Collector's Edition
description: Fear destroys the concept of values, but should not break you on the way to unraveling the disappearance of the Animages. Stop the kidnappings and relieve the city from fear!

name: Memory Land Extreme
description: Welcome to Memory Land Extreme! Can you remember 1000 objects? Do you want to?

name: Mars Colonization
description: The time has finally come when we can enjoy a new stage in human development!

name: Heck City Delivery
description: Heck City Delivery is an arcade driving game inspired by Crazy Taxi. You play as a delivery goblin in the post-apocalypse, delivering food in your blood-powered car to the demons who inhabit Heck City, 20XX. Make your deliveries quickly and earn enough money to pay your rent!

name: Hell of Verdun
description: Hell of Verdun is a first person horror game in which you'll experience the horrors of the First World War. Will you manage to discover all the secrets and escape from this hell? It's up to you, soldier.

name: Hentai Melody
description: What could be more beautiful than hentai?

name: Hentai Pink
description: Hentai Pink is a jigsaw puzzle. You must use your wisdom to put the puzzle back to its original shape.

name: Hentai SpaceSuit
description: Hentai SpaceSuit is a relaxing puzzle game. With the theme of space suit and 24 unique sexy girls. Enjoy sexy girls pictures and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

name: Hinami Bay
description: Hinami Bay is a casual, mini open-world hentai game. Talk to girls on a private island and train yourself to become smarter and stronger, so have a better chance with the ladies.

name: Hex Plat
description: The Game Is A Simple 2.5d Platform Action Game. The player can move and jump. That and solve puzzles using little gimmicks in the stages. The objective of each stage is simple: manipulate the spheres to reach the red glowing tiles, that's it.

name: Hot Ice
description: Welcome to Hot Ice! First person mode gives you a full sense of presense, realistic physical puck and only a short moment to escape the colision! You can invite friends, build a team and play online, or try your luck and play alone offline with an AI partner against exstra smart AI guys.

name: Hot Therapy
description: Hot Therapy is a sex game that healing the women guests who come to your therapy center and having exciting moments with them.Enjoy being a strong and charming therapist!

name: Human Multiplayer Game
description: An experimental multiplayer puzzle game made entirely by AI. Normally you would need a computer to play video games; It's about time you returned the favor.

name: Hypermarket Tycoon Manager
description: Hypermarket Tycoon Manager is an engaging business simulation game where you take on the role of a young entrepreneur who aims to build and grow a successful supermarket business.

name: I Am the Exorcist
description: One night, you passed the park, met the miko, and then start an exorcism story with her.

name: Idle Clans
description: Idle Clans is a multiplayer idle game that combines the classic MMORPG experience with simplified gameplay and less time commitment. Features include a player-driven economy, PvE, trading, quests, crafting and opportunities to play, socialize and collaborate with other players.

name: MechCrisis
description: Is there any way we can protect ourselves from intelligent machines? Choose your weapon, choose your exclusive character, upgrade your skills, and enjoy 15 minutes of pigeon experience.

name: Furies & Magazines: Episode 1
description: Graphic Novel Style Top Down Shooting Action Game which tells the story of Ivan Vinogradov, the victim of the CIA's top-secret project.

name: Gekko: Episode of Amelia
description: In a stage where swords, machines, and ponytails appear in modern society A school love-comedy visual novel in which you can enjoy an exciting and thrilling love story This is the second installment of the Gekko series. In this work, you can enjoy the love story of Amelia, a tsundere police girl.

name: Getting to the Other Side!!!
description: A modern spin on the classic arcade game. Play the only game that allows the player to run around as a crazy chicken! Complete each level and try to reach the end if you dare!

name: Greymarsh
description: Explore a bustling city in your quest to kill an evil tyrant in this text-based RPG, where simple RPG battle and inventory management is combined with a branching story in the manner of "choose your own adventure" game books of old.

name: Form Fitting
description: Form Fitting is a casual puzzle game where players must pick up different shaped blocks and drag them into the corresponding empty slots.

name: Fluxion
description: Fluxion is a thrilling 3D action platformer where you control a spaceship racing through a twisting tunnel, collecting energy orbs and avoiding obstacles.

name: FAS: Fight Action Sandbox
description: Unique turn-based sandbox 3D fighting game. Create your own character, fight AI or duel with friends online! Inspired by YOMI Hustle, TORIBASH and SPORE.

name: Fangun
description: This is Parkour.

name: Extreme Offroad Simulator
description: Do you feel bored that nothing amazes you anymore? Don't be discouraged!

name: Executioner Girls
description: Executioner Girls is a difficult turn-based RPG. Skilled adventurers and criminals hid in secret graveyard. You have to be "Chara", the executioner girl, and explore this place and complete the only mission given.

name: Endless Pinball
description: Welcome to the world of Endless Pinball, the addictive mobile game where you can challenge your skills and see how far you can go!

name: Einheriar
description: "Einheriar" is a tower defense game that aims to prevent monster invasions. You must summon potential and talented warriors from the world to protect this land!

name: Dormitory Hentai Clicker
description: Dormitory Hentai Clicker is a fascinating clicker in which you take on the role of the person in charge of running a dormitory.

name: Don't Rage
description: Will you make it to the end of parkour? Be careful, if you fall, you start over!

name: Chain Ninja
description: Chain Ninja is an exciting action-adventure game designed and developed by an experienced game development team. In the game, players need to play a chain ninja, traverse the entire room by hanging ropes in the air, obtain keys, and avoid various obstacles and traps in the level.

name: Christmasjong
description: Feel the atmosphere of Christmas with Christmasjong, a great Mahjong game with beautiful Chrsitmas theme Mahjong tiles. Customize everything you need! Set the background, the color and shape of tiles and many things more. Choose whatever mode you like: Classic or Match.

name: Crazy Prisoner
description: Crazy Prisoner - is a simple 2D horror game with elements of survival, in which you will play as an escaped prisoner named Joel.

name: Crosswalks
description: Crosswalks in a visual novel that tells different stories when you switch among perspectives. In 2018, an explainable portal appeared under the city of Sanghville, linking two parallel universe together. On one side there are dozens of unsolvable crimes, while the other side was always peaceful...

name: Crystal Blast
description: Crystal Blast is a single-player action-adventure game that offers a visually mysterious VR experience, created with Unreal Engine 5. Our goal is to survive in this mysterious cave and witness the remnants of past events while progressing towards the exit.

name: Dark Dead
description: Dark Dead is a hardcore 2D action-platformer in which you have to fight an ancient evil and try to understand how and why you ended up in this place.

name: Deep Dark Dungeon of Anglaus
description: "Deep Dark Dungeon of Anglaus" is a first-person horror game set in a medieval fantasy world. Face the oppressive fears that haunt you in the darkness. Face unknown opponents in the dungeon of the demon lord Anglaus.

name: Digs Mini Icy
description: Digs Mini Icy is a mini adventure starring Warf. It incorporates mechanics similar to old classics like Sokoban, but with uniquely designed puzzles and added features. Warf is stuck in an icy mountain and must find his way while collecting gems and overcoming various obstacles

name: Betrayal of Blood
description: An atmospheric 2.5D RPG that follows Thallia, a 15-year old girl from a formerly prosperous family, having her world upended when her father sells her off to the Labour Force for a few measly coins. Time to decide: slavery or freedom!

name: Car
description: Demonstrate your strong control ability in the game, allowing players to release their pressure through the game, and the wide track allows you to freely play driving.

name: Casino Heist
description: Casino Heist is a Romantic Comedy Heist Visual Novel and Dating Sim where you play as ex-Formula One driver Enrique Roca as he charms his way around the Las Vegas Strip to help his crew get away with the Heist of the Century.

name: Celestial Raider
description: Celestial Raider is an exciting and fun sci-fi vertical shoot'em up game.

name: Bye Bye Swingby
description: 'Bye Bye Swingby' is a fresh and unique simulation game that tells a sad story of escaping a destroyed Earth and exploring a new world. Take a rocket into space and use the gravity of the stars to travel to new worlds in Swingby.

name: Bushido: Drift and Race
description: Bushido is a racing game for all fans of Japanese automotive culture.

name: Brain Damage
description: Challenge your skills and push your limits in Brain Damage, the intense 2D action roguelite shooter with wave-based gameplay. With each upgrade, brain damage increases, making the game more challenging as you progress. Push the game to its limits. Can you break the game before it breaks you?

name: Boom Royale
description: Boom Royale - Shooting Game Boom Royale-building Flash is intense combat multiplayer! Take on up to 8 players online in this 2D game with cartoony visuals and gameplay between Soldat and Halo, inspired by the shooter Mini Militia and Teeworlds.

name: Boomerang Battles
description: Boomerang Battles is a fast paced action roguelike where you battle your way through 100 floors of a deadly dungeon with your trusty boomerang in a bid for your freedom. Pick your favourite boomerang, learn its attack patterns, find upgrades, and battle against exciting bosses. Escape if you can.

name: Blazing Ace
description: “I want to be stronger…” Summer bootcamp has begun!!! Let's make your dream come true!Beast Fella Foundation (BFF), an organization which monitors martial arts competitions among beastmen, has sent you an invitation letter. An unforgettable summer memory ensues.

name: Bots Chaos
description: Can you finish this game in 10 minutes? Bots Chaos is an action FPS game where you must destroy many robots to beat a score in 10 minutes. You will never get bored in this casual, hard and fast paced semi procedural game full of annoying robots, lasers and chaos.

name: School Life
description: School Life is a visual novel game with a school background and a light atmosphere.

name: 13iew
description: A girl abandoned in the basement of a hospital for some reason. Escape the hospital avoiding the doctor who abandoned the girl in the basement! Complete the story through hidden foreshadowings and various devices throughout the map and find out why the doctor abandoned the girl in the basement.

name: Abandoned World
description: Third-person action survival game set in a post-apocalyptic world. After the big disaster you will face bad things

name: Alongside
description: Tower defense strategy in a hand-drawn atmospheric style. The action of which takes place in a fairy-tale world inhabited by animals. To survive, you will need to tactically consider the placement of units, control the hero, using his abilities to fight off the invading hordes of evil.

name: Astral Guardian
description: Build various towers to resist the large number of monsters coming from the wormhole, by extending their walking routes.

name: Archery Battle VR
description: Archery Battle VR is a virtual reality archery game that allows you to experience real archery movements in the game.

name: A Night With Neil
description: "A Night With Neil" is the first in, hopefully, a series of choose-your-own-adventure text games done in Twine focusing on my various characters. Hang out with Neil! Get banged by Neil! Get ate by Neil!

name: Arcanika
description: Travel to a storybook world and help its denizens bring life back to the glade. Their world is in danger. The life force that once made things grow has disappeared and they need your help to restore it. Complete exciting Match-3 puzzles while earning treasure and achievements along the way.

name: Auto Brawl Chess
description: Auto Brawl Chess is a balanced blend of Auto Chess, Idle RPG, and CCG mechanics given form on an epic battlefield! Build your unique band of heroes, level them up, and set out on a thrilling Journey into the mythical world of Pangea waiting to be saved!

name: Beat Bricks
description: This game is very interesting, using the rebound principle of objects to play the game.

name: Back to the Dark
description: Singleplayer medieval-fantasy extraction looter with melee combat and the occasional arrow and spell. Demo available!

name: Stroke the Koala
description: The koala, a symbol of Australia (ignore the Kangaroo), cute when dry, horrifying when wet. Luckily, this Koala is dry.

name: Hermit's Tic-Tac-Toe
description: Mark the bottom left space, mark the bottom center space, mark the bottom right space, mark the middle left space, mark the middle center space, mark the middle right space, mark the top left space, mark the top center space, mark the top right space, win with X, win with O.

name: Rayflector
description: Rayflector is a bite-sized game about using the mirrors and other to direct a stream of particles to the receptacles.

name: Savannah Runnah
description: Sin descripción

name: Mir Korabley
description: Mir Korabley is a free to play online naval combat game by Lesta Games. Players compete in a variety of historic warships from numerous national origins. Take control of Destroyers, Cruisers, Battleships, Aircraft Carriers and Submarines in competitive game modes or cooperatively sail into historic operations.

name: White Wolf: Treasure Hunter
description: Action-Adventure & Strategy saving your world from Dark world that you unleashed. Quest though 5 element temples, collect items, and throw items. Unlock the hidden treasure shadow card castle.

name: Chameleon: DYH - Chapter 2
description:
Chapter Two of Chameleon - DYH continues Kai's journey to find his brother.
As Angie continues to investigate the infamous ''Silent Mourn'', Strom struggles to face his past.
Overwhelmed with feelings of sorrow and despair,
Strom remembers the fateful day when his eyes have changed.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Book of Mudora
description: Link’s newest quest is set a few generations after Twilight Princess and spans two different continents of Hyrule. Explore eight unique temples and defeat enemies and bosses in order to gain powerful items to assist you in your goal. Discover many areas of Hyrule and assist different races in their conflicts in order to stop the Dark Tribe from destroying Hyrule by obtaining the power of the Book of Mudora.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Mystery of Solarus DX
description: The Legend of Zelda: Mystery of Solarus DX is a fan-made sequel to The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past on SNES, using the same graphics and game mechanisms.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Return of the Hylian SE
description: The Legend of Zelda: Return of the Hylian SE is a Solarus-made remake of Vincent Jouillat’s first game, hence the SE suffix (stands for Solarus Edition). It was first released on 12th August, 2006, and made with another custom engine in C++. It has been remade entirely in Solarus to take advantage of the better capabilities of the engine.

name: Tunics!
description: Tunics! is a Rogue-like Legend of Zelda quest. It means it’s only dungeons, and they are randomly generated. Moreover, once you’re dead, you’ll have to restart from the beginning, losing all your improvements (weapons, health, etc). It should be considered a well-polished proof-of-concept.

name: Zeldo's Challenge Ch. 1: Bingo's Revenge
description: This game is then the first entry in ZeldoRetro’s series Le Défi de Zeldo (Zeldo’s Challenge). This first chapter is named La Revanche du Bingo (Bingo’s Revenge), and is much less ambitious than its sequel. It contains only one dungeon, and no overworld to explore, which makes the game rather short.

name: Zeldo's Challenge Ch. 2: The Tower of Memories
description: The action of the game is located in Takapa’s County, at the west of High-rule. Link is free to go directly to the Tower of Memories to try Zeldo’s Challenge or explore this brand new world. The game is in the same vein than ALTTP but with in wackier universe than the typical Legend of Zelda games, to which multiple video games characters join, and lots of references.

name: The Perfect Specimen
description:
You are Teagan, a Fae subject in an evil underground experiment run by the notorious mad scientist Doctor Dwight. Can you stay sane until help arrives? Or will you succumb to the Doctor’s dark experiments?

Content warning: Murder, stabbing, abusive relationship, medical horror, gore, psychological and physical torture, disturbing imagery, jumpscares, unsettling background music, drug use and sedatives.

name: Demian Saga
description:
Demian Saga: Chrono Pirates is a collectible RPG with a heavy focus on characters. The game features gorgeous character art, flashy cut scenes, and cute 3D models done in a chibi art style.

The level-sharing system is designed to help characters quickly level up, while the combat system requires players to plan which group of heroes from their pirate crew will engage in battle.

Massive real-time PvP content that allows up to 200 players from four unions (guilds) is also in the works and scheduled to release when the game launches.

name: Cards and Guns
description: Cards and Guns is a top-down arena shooter roguelite, where you’ll have to defeat hordes of creatures. Choose from a variety of cards and upgrades to create unique builds and survive to the end.

name: Viking Survivors
description: Viking Survivors is an action roguelite where you slay hordes of creatures while learning powerful skills to enhance your warrior. Unlock new characters, weapons and abilities. Design the most broken build and slay your enemies before they surround you!

name: FromWithin
description: A top down ole school shooter with great graphics

name: The ABC
description: This is the ABC story of Hee-chan's encounter with Brahmanism. Because Hee-chan is a girl who has a strong sense of justice, she is easy to lose her temper. Brahmana knows such a person's feature very well and he smells cinders from Hee-chan. Where does the smell of future comes from?

name: WakaVR
description: Welcome to the VR game experience that combines the fast-paced action of Beat Saber and the classic arcade-style gameplay of Pac-Man. In this game, you'll step into a neon-infused world, ready to carve your path through each level.

name: Cute Girls
description: Enjoy cute women! The adult puzzle game 'Cute Girls' contains many beautiful illustrations. The in-game illustrations are made up of beautiful colors and details, and you can enjoy a variety of characters.

name: AlcoFox
description: Join the adventure as a squirrel-fox in a fantasy world, exploring dark forests, mines, and swamps. Fight creatures and solve puzzles to reach the city of Dementia and a brighter future. Engaging gameplay, stunning visuals, and a compelling storyline make this game an epic experience.

name: Kitto Zenbu Watashi no Sei
description: The plan was simple: ignore all the phone messages, get a new girlfriend, and move on with life. Surely she'd take the hint... Or would she?

name: The Quintessential Quintuplets: Five Promises Made With Her
description: The Quintessential Quintuplets: Five Promises Made with Her is the third The Quintessential Quintuplets romance visual novel developed by MAGES. The theme this time is “heart-pounding summer vacation dates.” As for what kind of story will unfold this time, more information will be shared in future announcements.

name: The Cycle: Frontier - Breakthrough
description: The third season of The Cycle: Frontier.

name: Peck Peck's Garden
description:
Throw seeds to feed Peck Peck and watch the magic.
Find the secret way to grow flowers to harvest more seeds.

name: Solitaire
description:
Solitaire is a new experience of Solitaire Game. Play Solitaire to wake up your brain in the morning or to clear your mind before going to bed.
Solitaire has so many beautiful card's styles you can change and discover. You can touch or drag the cards to complete the game the way you feel most comfortable. Solitaire is concerned about the comfort of your experience. Solitaire has many card's styles and background's styles you can explore will make you feel excited and surprised.

name: Slidey Feet
description:
The objective is to step on each icy block in the level, cracking it underneath you.
Once all the blocks are cracked, this will break away the small cluster of rocks blocking your exit.
But, if you step back on a cracked block, you will fall off and will have to start again... From the start! So pay close attention to where you step!

name: This Is Not a Ball Game.
description: This Is Not A Ball Game includes more than 90 challenging levels with Retina-quality graphics and a mysterious French genie as your guide. Swipe and tap the screen to launch balls into the arena to free Star Blocks, and bring the magic back to the Absurd Circus!

name: Factor Find
description:
Inspired by the classic Word Search and Sudoku games, Factor Find is a puzzle game about math! The rules are simple: solve puzzles by making target numbers with factors on the board. For example, make 12 from 4*3 or 2*6.
Factor Find is more strategic than it initially appears. With the right strategy, it's possible to solve even the most complicated puzzles without doing complicated math! Calculators might be better than people at simple arithmetic, but they could never solve a Factor Find puzzle!

name: Match Pair 3D Puzzle
description:
Match Pair 3D Puzzle is a game to find matching pairs.
It's simple and fun, but it's not easy because each item moves.

name: Pixel Puzzles
description: Bring the bigger picture into focus with Pixel Puzzles, a relaxing new grid-based puzzler. Uncover the hidden images as you swipe to connect number and color-based pixel patterns, revealing the image beneath. With smooth mechanics and stunning photography in themes from abstract to nature to outer space, Pixel Puzzles is equally as challenging as it is calming.

name: Tappy Lap
description:
Fantastic one-finger Stock Car Racing!
Just "Tap" to change steering direction. Hold the screen to straighten up, speed match the car in front, or just brake. It's brilliantly context sensitive.
Get bonus points by Drafting other cars using the slipstream, blocking faster cars for a speed boost, or racing clean laps.

name: Fire Emblem: Midori
description:
Fire Emblem: Midori, also known as Fire Emblem: Green, has quite a simple premise. It takes green haired characters from across the whole Fire Emblem series and puts them in one game. It’s not a simple reskin either: many vanilla chapters have been expanded, alongside some beloved (or despised) chapters from other Fire Emblem games.

Genealogy of the Holy War and Thracia 776 gave heavy inspiration for this creation, as a skill system is present, along with FE5 style magic and tradable stat-boosting rings. You don’t have to worry about choosing from Eirika and Ephraim’s routes either; both are played in one save file.

name: Word Solitaire
description: A Solitaire-like game where the objective is to clear the card columns by forming five letter words.

name: You are Dough
description:
you are dough

become bread

name: Coco Notes
description: Compose songs by fishing up coconuts, across 4 game modes.

name: The Delusions of Maximillian Wurst
description: The first chapter of a loop-de-loop platformer in which you control Maximillian Wurst, silver-tongued poet and abject moron, as he pursues a fantasy that wants nothing to do with him. Escape Father Time! Shoot as many Chadwicks as you can! Stumble along with poison coursing through your lily liver!

name: Fallout: Dust
description: Dust is a Post-Apocalyptic survival simulator with an emphasis on lore and story. Dust completely overhauls nearly every aspect of the game to better represent an apocalyptic survival-horror atmosphere. Combat, weather, perks, loot, enemies, you name it. Some areas have even been visually overhauled. All vanilla NPCs have either been killed or changed beyond all recognition. You will not be able to complete quests or join factions. There is but one quest in Dust. Stay alive.

name: WeAreDreaming
description: WeAreDreaming is a Chinese Yume NIkki fangame. You play as Zakurotsuki (附石榴), who refuses to leave her room. Exploring the dream world can also unlock wallpapers, music and menu skins.

name: SIght
description: SIght is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. You play as a cyclops named Nakime and the goal of the game is to obtain the five Items (アイテム) scattered throughout each world to unlock one of two endings.

name: Illove dream
description: Illove dream (爱梦症) is a Chinese Yume Nikki fangame. You explore Aiko's dreams, who refuses to leave her room.

name: Butterfly Effect
description: Butterly Effect is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. The goal is to collect all four effects scattered throughout the world. You play as Mari exploring areas which reflect memories.

name: Conexus
description:
Conexus is a short Yume Nikki fangame that follows a young adventurer who mysteriously awakes in a realm of interconnected worlds named the Conexus.

Uncover the reason why you were brought to the Conexus, and learn about the realm's history along the way. Or if you don't feel like performing story errands, just treat it like a digital museum instead.

This game features 17 unique areas to explore, with lots of weird things to see and people to meet everywhere you go.

Unlike the typical Yume Nikki fangame, there aren't any "effects" to find here, instead all of the focus is placed on touring a fully open realm where every path leads to somewhere else.

name: Sharkphobia
description: Sharkphobia is a short underwater found footage survival stealth horror focused on galeophobia, thalassophobia & claustrophobic environments.

name: Yume Slide
description: Yume Slide is a non-traditional Yume Nikki fangame. It is a timed balancing game where players must tilt the platform to prevent Madotsuki from falling off.

name: Cell of Empireo: Isoi Sanemitsu no Records
description: Sin descripción

name: Danzai Shitsu
description:
A self-proclaimed victim and someone called by that person a perpetrator appear in front of you.
You will listen to the exchange between the two and decide whether the victim should take revenge on the perpetrator from a "neutral" standpoint.
But please be careful.
Because here, revenge means "execution of the perpetrator at the hands of the victim".

name: Fall Guys: Horns Aplenty Pack
description:
Tune up and play your next Show at full blast!

Includes:
Top Brass (Whole Costume)
Tuba Or Not Tuba (Whole Costume)
600 x Show-Bucks!

name: Madden NFL 17
description: Old gen port of Madden NFL 17.

name: Fall Guys: Season 2 Starter Pack
description:
Blast off into a whole new season with this astronomical bundle!

Includes:
Crater King (Whole Costume)
Moon Bean (Whole Costume)
Party Planetoid (Whole Costume)
1000 x Show-Bucks!

name: Fall Guys: Starter Pack
description: New to the Blunderdome? Grab two delectable costumes and 1000 Show-Bucks to start in style!

name: Fall Guys: Popping Whizzbanger Pack
description:
Dazzle your opponents with this candied apple, perfect for any sweet-toothed stumbler!

Bundle Includes:
Popping Whizzbanger (Whole Costume)
600 x Show-Bucks

name: Madden NFL 21 Mobile
description: Sin descripción

name: Madden NFL 21
description: Sin descripción

name: Fall Guys: Stunning Sealife Pack
description:
Make waves in your next Show with these deep sea delights!

Includes:
Pinchy McNab (Whole Costume)
U Jelly (Whole Costume)
Pumped Up Puffer (Whole Costume)
2000 x Show-Bucks!

name: Madden NFL 22
description:
Madden NFL 22 is where gameday happens.

All-new features in Franchise include staff management, an enhanced scenario engine, and weekly strategy. Share avatar progress and player class between Face of The Franchise and The Yard with unified progression. And for the first time ever in Ultimate Team, adjust Superstar X-Factors at halftime.

name: The Legend of Zelda XD2: Mercuris' Chess
description:
The Legend of Zelda XD2: Mercuris Chess is the sequel of the first XD parodic game, and was also released on April 1st, in 2017 this time. As a direct sequel, the overworld is expanded, the story is extended and the funny tone is kept, if not bettered!

The game was made in 10 weeks (!), beginning with an a discussion about how people always mispronounce Mercuris Chest (note the T at the end). Diarandor suggested that a game could be named Mercuris Chess to make fun of the title, and the same day it was decided that it would be the next big April’s fools joke.

The team worked really hard, and you can feel the improvements from the previous games. The game has 2 dungeons, and lots of side-quests and secrets everywhere, and also feature silly NPCs around the overworld. Be sure to speak to every one to not miss a joke!

name: Fall Guys: Free Range Fall Guys Pack
description:
Show off your eggsquisite taste with these hard-boiled heroes!

Includes:
Free Range (Whole Costume)
Chicken Out (Whole Costume)
600 x Show-Bucks!

name: Madden NFL 23
description:
Play your way into the history books in Madden NFL 23!
Control your impact with every decision in all-new ways. Call the shots in Franchise with free agency and trade logic updates, play your way into the history books in Face of the Franchise: The League, and assemble the most powerful roster in all of Madden Ultimate Team.

name: The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Dream
description:
The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Dream is a fanmade remake of the Game Boy cult classic The Legend of Zelda: Link’s Awakening, first published in 1993 and enhanced with colors in 1998 with its DX version.

The Solarus-made remake uses A Link to the Past graphics, extended with lots of custom sprites and tiles, in order to represent all the game’s characters, enemies and landscapes. Even the music has been remade in SNES-like fashion, to get the perfect feeling as if the game was released on Super Nintendo.

name: Kingsvein
description: Explore and reclaim the infested castle-city of Kingsvein! Ride into its depths on your trusty wyvern, and lead your customizable party of Knights and Mystics in deep tactical combat.

name: Dying Light 2: Stay Human - Chicken Bundle
description: Establish a new pecking order in The City. Become a chicken that fears no one with the Rooster Suit. Cut and scratch your enemies until they become a chicken-hearted mess, and soar through the sky, proving to them all that even a chicken can fly!

name: Not Only Nine
description: A narrative turn-based RPG where the only fights are the bosses. Play as a cat and journey through the afterlife to save your human. Meet loveable characters and explore what it means to exist.

name: Cartel Tycoon: Lieutenants Pack - La Familia
description: The "Lieutenants Pack - La Familia" DLC unlocks access to a set of 5 Lieutenants and their unique abilities that will aid you in your conquest.

name: Moon is Not the Limit
description: Reach into orbit with Moon is not the Limit! Take to the stars as a recent recruit to the space program and learn all about the science behind space travel.

name: Day of the dead
description: A multiplayer low-poly styled zombieshooter game

name: Mike and the Zombies
description: The gas runned out and you're in the middle of nowhere! Now it's time to kick, shoot, fire and rip apart zombies and monsters in this 80's thriller platform game.

name: Simple Multipliers
description: Unique idle game with endless gameplay mechanics. Hardcore goals but fair possibilities to reach them. Create the most powerful income generator and be the best among all players!

name: The Green Room Experiment: Episode 1 VR
description: You're locked in a dream and you need to wake up. This game is designed on an escape game structure, you must solve a puzzle to move on to the next table. You will be transported to a dreamlike, strange universe, mixing exploration, mystery and poetry.

name: RushLane
description: Welcome to RushLane, an adrenaline-pumping, high-speed racing game set on the scenic forest roads! Take control of your car and navigate through the twists and turns while avoiding oncoming traffic and collecting points to unlock new vehicles.

name: Bold
description: Bold is a unique, quiet and elegant third person exploration game, as well as a Zen game for traveling, walking, watching picturesque landscapes. The protagonist of the game, deer (bold), finds deer herds and obtains inner peace by crossing grasslands, deep forests, wilderness, rivers, and lakes.

name: Fall Guys: Crow Pack
description:
This'll give you something to crow about!

Bundle Includes:
Crow Costume (Upper and Lower)
600 x Show-Bucks

name: Fall Guys: Otter Delights Pack
description: They might not be great butlers, but who cares when they're this cute?

name: Fall Guys: Wildfire Pack
description:
Make your next round an ultimate knockout with these ringside rumblers!

Bundle Includes:
Wildfire (Whole Costume)
Blunderdome Sports Live (Whole Costume)
Bean Analyst (Whole Costume)
2000 x Show-Bucks!

name: Sound Garden
description: A puzzlescript game in which you create a garden of sounds.

name: Fall Guys: Neigh Neigh Pack
description:
Guaranteed to turn your next round into a one-horse race!

Bundle Includes:
Neigh Neigh (Whole Costume)
600x Show-Bucks

name: Lemmings & Oh No! More Lemmings
description: This port of Lemmings sees a slight graphics increase, as well as much higher quality recordings of the soundtrack due to the CD format. The fast forward feature is also available here, and the game also features an all-new intro.

name: MyPopgoes
description: MyPopgoes is an entirely hand-drawn teaser game for the Popgoes series. It was created in less than a month and features visuals from Sian Mewburn (Turntail, official FNaF artist) and Emil Macko (creator of Five Nights at Candy's).

name: Maimai DX Festival Plus
description:
The updated version of maimai Deluxe Festival.

General Information / Changes:
- Favorite songs can now be registered on the maimaiでらっくすNET website, and they will appear in a special category in-game.
- Rivals can now be set, in order to challenge other players' high scores.
- Extra area travel distance after reaching the Task Track is now stored.
- When using tickets that increase area travel distance, MASTER and Re:MASTER charts are now playable directly.
- Track skip options are now accessible for the life values that would be seen in a Perfect Challenge (Life 300 down to Life 1).
- New display option in the centre of the screen: DX Score (subtractive type), showing the maximum obtainable DX Score. In addition, when using the Judgement Breakdown display, the number of Critical Perfect is separated from the number of Perfect.
- Note effect volume changes: TOUCH notes are separated into their own category, and the note sound volume for BREAK SLIDE notes can be adjusted too.
- In Invitation Play, ADVANCED charts can now be selected.
- On the splash screen before starting a song, BPM, chart designer name, and current record are now displayed.
- On the last track of a credit, the top light will change it color to red to indicate it is the last track.

name: ManHandler
description: Male version of Erosoft's SimuSex, featuring similar gameplay and graphics.

name: LEGO World Builder 2
description: The sequel to LEGO World Builder. It is a Shockwave puzzle-platformer that was hosted on the official LEGO website in 2003. The player must collect LEGO pieces and the recipes that allow them to assemble those pieces into different kinds of units and vehicles. Each unit type has its own capabilities, allowing the player access new areas and collect more pieces and recipes.

name: Club Pinball
description: Club Pinball is a preloaded game on the Nokia 3220 and Nokia 2220 devices, running J2ME.

name: Until Daybreak
description: Léon and his twin sister Anna have always been together, but five years after the deaths of their parents, a deadly illness contracted by Anna threatens to separate them. Determined to fight this fate, Léon is prepared to do anything to stop the same Angel of Death that claimed his parents from taking his sister away from him.

name: Arcana Heart
description: Arcana Heart was released on PlayStation 2 in Japan by AQ Interactive, featuring the option of playing characters in their "Original" or "Full" modes, reflecting the original and patched versions of characters from the arcade original, while voice acting was also added to all story segments.

name: Epic Roller Coasters: Candyland
description: We found an abandoned shed and turned it into the most delicious roller coaster ever! This DLC includes: - Roller coaster map: Candyland. - One roller coaster cart - 1 weapon. - 1 companion character.

name: New York City Driver
description: Explore the streets of New York in ultra realistic detail! Cruise along Broadway, Wall Street and the famous Avenue of the Americas, including Times Square!

name: Crank! Push! Tilt!
description: An arcade-style dexterity game for the Playdate

name: Perfect Fit
description: Casual drop box fit in the gap game

name: SimbaQuest
description: A short, April Fools adventure with dozen of interactions.

name: Spellshot
description: Survive against hordes of zombies using bullets enchanted with spells purchased from a rerolling shop. Spellshot is a fast-paced, rogue-lite fps in which you create unique builds by combining and upgrading spells, activating set bonuses, and collecting rare items.

name: Solitaire
description: Solitaire is a game by Nokia that came pre-installed in some Nokia mobile phones, like Nokia 6101 and Nokia 6060, running J2ME.

name: Canal Control
description: A game preloaded on some Nokia mobile phones, this game consist on build the longest pipe you can with the pieces provided before the water reaches the other end. The longer it is, the more points you earn.

name: Ball Drop
description: Ball Drop is a puzzle platformer game. The ball rolls down using gravity and you must use the mouse to move platforms to guide the ball to the goal line. The objects in the game rotate following the mouse and you can use them to solve puzzles and navigate around hazards.

name: Avatars Saga
description: Sin descripción

name: Ice Scream United: Multiplayer
description: Sin descripción

name: Iron Force 2
description: Sin descripción

name: KleptoCats Cartoon Network
description: Sin descripción

name: Milk Farm Tycoon
description: Sin descripción

name: Push-Up T-Rex
description:
This is the story of Felix the T-Rex.
Since he hatched from the egg, he has dreamed of being the first T-Rex doing Push-Ups.
Together you’ll discover the coolest cities of Planet Earth.
The more weights you collect on your journey, the longer the tiny little T-Rex arms will grow.

name: Yum! Finger
description:
"Yum finger" is a leisure exciting game, players in the game's role is a little fat man is trying to lose weight, you need to finger on the screen, moving through crazy escape cake, ham, green beans, donuts, bananas, etc., which are small monster, once they touch, the fat man will explode! But don't worry, food monsters will be according to their own favorite fixed track running, so as long as your response fast enough, or after a few sessions, just to avoid them well!
Set in the game, there are props, novice players can through use of them to put into this crazy game as soon as possible and then got gold and the great achievement badges. Do not hesitate to begin the fun and exciting trip to burn calories glory!!!!

name: Wizard Golf RPG
description: This is the story of an adventuring hero who doesn't mind being below par. As a powerful wizard, you'll make your way through each floor of a treacherous dungeon, one hole at a time. Instead of using a ball and clubs, you'll propel yourself through each carefully constructed corridor. The hazards on these courses are a bit more hazardous than usual. Don't worry: you've got a spell or two you can use against the monsters that lurk in the roughs.

name: Whacky Ball
description:
In Whacky Ball, your device's camera transports you into a world of challenging ball games. Using motion recognition, you whack the balls virtually on the screen using your hands or head as if you are really there.
Whack the birds and other flying objects before they whack into your ball. Score three times in a row to win bonus points.

name: Spangled
description: Another brain twisting puzzle game from Unexpect3rd Development. Match 3 with a twist! Slide and drop pieces then match either colors or patterns. Survive long enough to score high or clear stage goals.

name: Slide On Ice
description: Do you like taking on the hardest games ever to constantly push your skills to the edge? If your answer is yes, then Slide On Ice is just the perfect game for you right now!

name: Super Swish
description:
Shoot Hoops Like it's 1990!
With simple one-handed game play, Super Swish is a basketball game that's easy to pick up and play whenever you feel like shootin' some hoops!
There's no timer - it's just you vs. the hoop. The more swishes you make in a row, the more you score. The more you score, the harder it gets. Miss 3 shots and it's game over!

name: Super Boy Adventurous
description:
The year is 2999 and the galaxy is in chaos. Humanity has discovered alien technology allowing space travel between the planets, opening up the universe for exploration and conquest.
War happen from more alien attack on our planet.
The Super Boy Adventurous have a mission impossible. Must be destroy all the enemy, keep the earth for our child.

name: Top Dungeon War
description: Your are hero and mission is clear: defeat the monsters, claim the treasure, and save the hostages who have been taken captive by the evil forces that dwell within the dungeon. But this will not be an easy task. The monsters are relentless, and their numbers are vast. From hordes of slavering goblins to towering giants and deadly dragons, you will need all of your skills and abilities to overcome the obstacles that stand in your way.

name: Twisted Machines
description: Master the wasteland by killing off marauding freaks in their twisted machines. Unleash these monstrous racing machines to bash your way through the hazardous wasteland highway. Avoid endless riders from ramming into you to be victorious.

name: Universe 42
description:
Welcome to never-ending world of the Universe 42.
Universe 42 is a 2D endless runner game.
Your mission is to collect resources to discover new planet that fits for life.
Universe 42 presents you with a infinite world to explore, filled with unique planets and lifeforms, and constant danger and action: asteroids, electric fields, dangerous obstacles.

name: Magic Words: Craft Words
description:
Welcome to Magic Words, a new free game! This puzzle game will improve your vocabulary and spelling skills. Use letters and make words together with a young magician, try dozens of challenging and fun tasks.
Don’t get confused if you can't find a word. There are lots of different hints that will help you - highlight a correct word, use magic letters or just refresh all of them.
Make the application and input languages different to learn new foreign words, increase your vocabulary and practice your spelling skills.

name: Mini Boxing
description:
You control "Nick-Joe" the Fighter so help him to win the Boxer championship tournament!
But you need to defeat six great-funny boxer to win the challenge.

name: Out of Body
description:
Souls are on the loose! They need your help in guiding them higher and higher towards the heavens in this terrifically twisted and exciting endless adventure!
Being dead sure isn’t easy. These poor souls have to navigate tricky environments in order to spirit away. Help them evade obstacles (these souls don’t like bonking their heads on things any more than living people do!) and collect precious gems; use these gems to unlock new worlds and explore amazing new stories.

name: Pam's Fantastic Escape
description:
Are you up for a cozy escape-room puzzle adventure...in a dream-like world? Let's go now!
Linn (that's you!) is going camping with Pam (Pandora, your best buddy) and Tammy (Pam's sister) for the weekend. The game starts from Pam's garage, then moves on to a mountain cottage and more mysterious places.
In order to go on your adventure, you need to solve puzzles to find the way forward through multiple chapters!

name: PayaPaya
description:
PayaPaya is a drop-type puzzle game.
This is obtained score by connecting at least 4 of the same color coming from above the two blocks.

name: Santa Draw Ride
description: Santa Draw Ride is a physics based endless winter game which give you a Christmas mood! Santa rushes on his magic sleigh in search of lost Christmas gifts. Your task is to draw an icy road that will help Santa Claus to collect gifts and bonuses, as well as avoid dangerous traps and obstacles such as birds, snow islands, snowmans, x-mas trees etc.

name: Sleepy Squares
description:
The goal is to help the Sleepy Squares get to sleep by placing them next to their fellow squares. The catch is they only close 1 eye for every square adjacent to them and they all have a different number of eyes.
That’s right, it has infinite potential if you are up for the challenge. Show off to your friends in our global sleepy leaderboards and see where your sleep IQ stacks up. Unlock multiple game modes and play them simultaneously with all your game data kept intact.

name: Marins Dream Garden
description: Manage a garden by finding the seeds scattered throughout the dream islands.

name: Forgotten Warrior
description: Forgotten Warrior is an action game which came pre-installed on certain models of Samsung mobile phones. The premise of the game is simple: a boy loves a girl; when the boy is asleep an evil gang kidnaps the girl. The boy is awakened by his brother who tells him what has happened and instructs him along the way. The game is played on static screens with platforms, enemies, hazards, etc. In the beginning the boy has no weapons, so he must avoid all enemies or attack them stealthy with a punch. Later on he acquires a weapon and magical spells. Along the way the boy can collect coins which allow him to buy spells and potions.

name: Golden Manager
description: Sin descripción

name: Gyro Skate
description:
Gyro Skate turns your iPhone into a skateboard for your fingers.
You do a trick and Gyroskate knows what’s going on.

name: Grids
description:
Welcome to Grids!
Grids is a tactical turnbased online strategy game where you take control of your very own army!
The objective of the game is to defeat your opponents commander-unit (the tower).
You can choose between connecting to our grids-servers, and get matched against an opponent, or you can host your own game and let your friends connect to you. Hosting a game requires port forwarding.

name: Smartsquid
description: Smartsquid - how fast is your brain?

name: Jack the Knight Adventures 2
description:
An unprecedented touch reaches you: The Adventures of Jack Knight
Jack, this brave knight of whom all great heroes are inspired ...
You're the only one who can help Jack in this adventure !!!
You will help him to overcome Fear, loneliness, brave a thousand dangers to conquer the ultimate goal: Love !!

name: Kick and Cows
description: Kick and Cows is a mixture of football and animal teams, top-down arcade game and logic challenges in all levels. In a nutshell, you have to score a goal in every of the 30 levels in each of the 7 worlds. Each and every one of the worlds has a unique design and new features making the game more challenging and compelling.

name: Jumpox
description:
Follow Jumpox on its adventure to the new lands
Challenge yourself with this simple, yet difficult game
Tap anywhere to jump up or down
Avoid all deadly spikes

name: Jigsaw Tile
description: This is a very addictive innovation crush game, Unique gameplay will make you unconsciously indulge them forget the time. The game is very easy to get started, but it is very difficult to get a high score!

name: Air Hockey Halloween
description: Air Hockey Halloween is a great air hockey game with halloween theme, beautiful graphics, great effects, easy to learn, hard to master gameplay, and it's free! Play against the gruesome, horrifying monsters with the fearless monster hunter in the game's campaign, and try to beat each enemy the best way you can to unlock new content, or play against your friend on the same device! 24 different monsters to beat on 4 levels.

name: Baseball Battle
description: Step up to the plate in Wil & Shelby's Baseball Battle and take on the world in classic pitcher-vs-batter duels. Hit and pitch with ease using intuitive multi-touch controls. Earn points to increase your power, accuracy and intuition with each victory. Featuring input from 2013 Rookie of the Year Wil Myers and St. Louis ace Shelby Miller, the battle for baseball supremacy is on!

name: Basket and Ball
description: Tap the jump button to bounce the living ball as if you are dribbling it! Lead the stray ball into the basket passing acrobatic trials and solving puzzles. Test your throwing aim every 3 levels. Use the time stopping bonus to get out of difficult situations. Avoid robot cops and fire traps, jump over spikes, dive into water, and propel yourself with explosions on 120 challenging levels. iCade and MFI gamepads are fully supported!

name: Beach Mini Golf 2
description:
This sports game is a new, high-quality, and easy-to-use 3d minigolf 3d game for your phone and tablet.
Play up to 60 levels golf course in a beautiful island.
Each hole contains additional obstacles and complex angles. Aim well and make putts in a minimum shots !
Try to stay below par on every hole to win 3 stars! Train yourself to become the master of mini golf club.

name: Bull King of Circus
description: The new play-style 3D racing & action game that it is easy to control.

name: Beat Bop: Pop Star Clicker
description: You've got an audience wherever you go, so gather your bandmates, upgrade your guitar and costumes, avoid media scandals, wear your best idol smile and put on the show of your life.

name: Century City
description:
Mine the fortune low underground and build the greatest city of the century.
Go on an adventure with your cute little miner buddies. Tap to mine for gold, and watch as the money keeps piling up. Slowly build up your city with all kinds of different buildings from homes, schools, banks to parks and markets.

name: Faily Brakes 2
description: Let’s start the race on a high speed in the car crashing game Faily Brakes 2! You have to stay behind the wheel as long as possible and not crash the car. Watch out the cars which will try to hit you! Smash 'em all, survive as long as possible on the road & win in the demolition derby. Get ready and take part in the race for survival!

name: Farkle King
description: FarkleKing play online with unique features and exciting play modes is always full of strategy and highly confrontative that makes it more special than others – what you throw may not make you win but what you choose in a wise way will make you King.

name: Deltarune: Chapter Rewritten - Scampton The Great
description: Deltarune: Chapter Rewritten created by The Winterer is a roleswap AU with the spirit of a kid's cartoon, follow Asriel, Noelle and Charkis down the dreaded abyss of Kueen's dungeon and free this sad, strange little man.

name: Idol Showdown
description:
Idol Showdown is the definitive fan-made hololive fighting game experience, powered by rollback netcode. Engage in exciting duels as your favorite H=hololive talent and prove once and for all who the strongest idol is using the game’s easy-to-learn controls.

Pick up on this game’s easy-to-learn control scheme in no time to get straight into playing. Even hololive fans who are inexperienced with traditional fighting games can have fun!

Besto Games has been hard at work developing the game’s online rollback netcode to make the online experience as smooth as we can.

Explore the vast world of hololive from our roster of iconic hololive talents, with moves inspired by their most memorable moments and personality traits. Fight across the virtual world in lovingly recreated hololive locations. Jam out to remixes of your favorite hololive original songs while raising idol hell.

hololive talents are re-imagined as core fighting game archetypes with a unique twist. Bring chaos in the battlefield with flashy attacks and high-octane action.

name: Block Breaker Deluxe
description: New version of Block Breaker Deluxe (2004), with modernized visuals.

name: Cricket 24
description: Cricket 24 is the culmination of a decade of Cricket video game development and includes teams from every corner of the globe.

name: Waifu or Laifu
description: The rules are simple: liked the character - swipe your finger to the left. Did not like it - swipe to the right. Not to mention, you can learn how many people feels the same for your "2D love".

name: Anime In 10 Words
description: The rule is simple: choose the answer that suits provided description the most! There're also 3 types of hints in case you got stuck at some point: "additional info", "50/50", "one mistake is ok".

name: My Baby Unicorn
description: You got a gift - a super cute virtual unicorn baby! Become the best magical pony nanny! Hatch a colorful egg and take care of the cutest newborn unicorn with rainbow hair! Bathe, feed, potty train, dress up, sing to sleep and play fun games with your tiny virtual pet friend! Decorate the baby unicorn’s room with rainbow colors! Play My Baby Unicorn virtual pet care game for kids every day and watch your virtual pet pony grow!

name: 3D Cricket
description: A cricket game that comes as a part of the Emirates In-Flight Entertainment.

name: 3D Football
description: A football game that comes as a part of the Emirates In-Flight Entertainment.

name: In-Flight Tennis Club
description: Sin descripción

name: Bad Piggies: Create Your Own Angry Birds Levels!
description: Bad Piggies: Create Your Own Angry Birds Levels! is a cancelled webgame meant to release in 2011 by Rovio Entertainment, the game was never mentioned or announced by the company and was left in mystery until a website was found in 2021, and its data was already deleted from the server thus it wouldn't load, but an earlier version of the game was found that actually worked, but you need to have Adobe Flash though for it to load.

name: Bad Piggies Build
description: Bad Piggies Build is a cancelled webgame meant to release in 2012 by Rovio Entertainment, however, this game was never mentioned or announced by the company and was left in mystery until a SWF download was found on the Appspot link.

name: WildSnake
description: The Game Boy port of WildSnake.

name: Kits
description: Kits is an assembly game. Discover, construct and admire beautiful little works of art. Set your own complexity and challenge levels and enjoy KITS the way you like to play.

name: The King of Fighters XV: Characters - Kim Kaphwan
description: "Kim Kaphwan" can be used in THE KING OF FIGHTERS XV.

name: Path of Colors
description: Embark on a colorful adventure, mix and connect colors to reach the target base while overcoming challenging obstacles in the exciting console game, Path of Colors.

name: Ultra Pixel Survive
description: In Ultra Pixel Survive you'll find yourself in a pixel world where a young guy named Thomas lives. Today he is going on a journey across the country, and you will be his company. On the screen you will see your character in a certain place. Using the control keys you will guide your hero forward. On his way there will be various traps and dangers that he will have to overcome with your guidance. Sometimes the character may encounter monsters and wild animals, which you can destroy using different weapons from your character's inventory.

name: Cafe Maid
description:
Have you ever dreamed about being indulged by a maid? How about by a harem of them? In Cafe Maid you can live that dream to the fullest. You take on the role of a maid cafe owner and your task is to manage the place and services. Upgrade and customize the cafe and turn it into the perfect lewd establishment. Gather the cutest talent you can possibly imagine around yourself. Hire a sex maniac streamer, an orally fixated cakegirl, a kinky dominatrix, a bisexual singer, an innocent student, and many more. All of these beauties are dying to get to know you. They are very receptive to your flirting and just love everything you can provide, especially if it involves one of your special private trainings.

Tap the maids to collect money, upgrade their service spots so that they can entertain the guests even more and earn more money. After a time you will be able to automatize this process, freeing up your hands to do something else... for example to hire new maids to do new functions in the cafe, or to help them to provide special services to the customers in one of the back rooms.

When your current cafe is successful enough you can decide to sell it to another investor and get a big profit in return that you can spend on the maids or on managing your brand. Your decisions determine how much more efficiently will your next company earn money.

Don't foget, in Cafe Maid your cafe makes money even while you are AFK (eg. while you are shaving or watching your favorite movies IRL), and when you come back you can spend all that to make your cafe the biggest success around the globe.

name: Noctropolis
description: Night Dive Studios presents Noctropolis, a beautifully rendered, adult graphic adventure about the grisly things you dream. New Enhanced Edition.

name: Mizz Survival
description: Mizz Survival is Survival game Style , Crafting Building Adventure with friend in the wide world or fight with orther team and meet the horrors at night. 2 GameMode ( 1. Survival , 2. Team Battle )

name: Genshindle
description: Wordle game based on Genshin Impact characters.

name: The King's Campaign
description: The King's Campaign is a hybrid of Grand Strategy and Real-Time Strategy gameplay set in Medieval Europe and North Africa, where you manage your cities, engage in diplomacy and direct your armies on the world map before plunging into battle and commanding your troops directly on the battlefield

name: Fall Guys: Pegwin Party Pack
description:
Grab this bundle to make every Round a Pegwin Pursuit!

Includes:
Pegwinner (Whole Costume)
Pegwinging It (Whole Costume)
Pegwhimsy (Whole Costume)
1000 x Show-Bucks!

name: Fall Guys: Doc Glover Pack
description:
Grab your next crown in style with this handy bundle!

Includes:
Doc Glover (Whole Costume)
600 x Show-Bucks!

name: Warlocks Quarry: Random Worlds + Explorer
description: Sin descripción

name: Windy Meadow: A Roadwarden Tale
description: Windy Meadow - A Roadwarden Tale is an interactive slice-of-life visual novel about choosing your own path. Help three protagonists make the most important choices of their lives. Featuring a multitude of hand-crafted characters and a richly detailed village set in the Roadwarden story world.

name: Fall Guys: Plush Fox Pack
description:
Cuddle up to the competition with this adorable hoodie!

Includes:
Plushfox (Whole Costume)
600 x Show-Bucks!

name: The Quintessential Quintuplets: Omoide VR - Yotsuba
description:
The Quintessential Quintuplets: Omoide VR - Yotsuba is the second official VR adventure game based on the popular manga series!

Play as Futaro Uesugi and enjoy spending time with the fourth Nakano Quint, Yotsuba, in this VR adventure game.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II - Season 03
description:
Weapons hot vaqueros.
Alejandro and Valeria face off in Season 03

name: Picoban
description: Your goal is to reach the green gem in each level. Use the arrow keys to move and push red blocks out of your way. Find keys to open locked passages.

name: Isoball
description: Use the blocks, arrows, ramps, and bridges that are provided in the area at the bottom to build a track for the ball to get to the hole without falling and breaking. Click on a piece in the bottom area and click on a place to place it. Click on a piece repeatedly in the bottom area to rotate it.

name: Hexes
description:
Hexes, a new puzzle game from Elektri.

Move gems across the game board to get matches of 3. But, watch out, moving a single gem will move all gems, and adds more gems to the board.

Plan your moves carefully. Once the board is full of gems its game over. Matching 3 or more gems will remove them from the board and keep your game going.

With lots of challenge and replay-ability, how high will your score in Hexes be?

name: Chocotto Land Online
description: 2.5Dimension MMO RPG from "cocone v corporation"

name: Appare-den: Fukuryuu no Shou
description: Appare-den: Fukuryuu no Shou plays like a traditional top-down Japanese RPG, with world map traveling, random enemies, and turn-based combat. The attacks in combat are animated; after the player has assigned command to all the characters, the animation shows the entire party attack at once. There are also special techniques the heroes can learn and execute in battles.

name: Skolios
description: Cora wakes up in the main hall of an abandoned train station. She has no memory of what happened before she woke up, and an ominous silence surrounds the area. It's foggy outside the windows, the doors are locked and something disastrous seems to overtake the building... There are others, lost and confused, like Cora. And there are also the shadows and deformed creatures lurking and crawling in the dark, waiting to draw them into the deep. Will she be able to find a way out?

name: Endzeit
description: Endzeit is a German RPG-Maker game by Real Troll and is a humorous take on the third world war, set in an alternate history, where said world war takes place in 1969.

name: On the Job
description: Sneak your way past guards and obstacles through as many levels as you can in this turn-based roguelite stealth game, getting top secret documents and super cool gadgets on the way!

name: Mystery Case Files: The Dalimar Legacy Collector's Edition
description: It's the opportunity of several lifetimes when the intrepid Master Detective finds themselves in the body of their greatest rival!

name: Fireball Spam
description: A two-button, 1 shot, 1 kill fighting game! Taking all of the action of fireball wars in other fighting games and upping the stakes with instantaneous death! No d-pad. No EX-moves, No frills. Just jump, shoot and win!

name: Vico 3: Tale of the Seven Seas
description: Vico 3: Tale of the Seven Seas, is one of the most unique arcade games both graphically and mechanically. Featuring Real Time reflections and Gorgeous HD graphics!

name: Gravel Gang
description: Gravel Gang is a simple but challenging real-time strategy/tactic casual game. Make smart plans and show your strategic skills, fight and conquer the challenging maps to WIN! You will be richly rewarded for victories, you can buy epic heroes and show your skills with them.

name: Memory Mosaic
description: Sin descripción

name: Food Truck Tycoon + Flowlines VS
description:
Enjoy the two in one gaming bundle with Flowlines VS and Food Truck Tycoon:

In Food Truck Tycoon, test your skills and talent as owner of a busy food truck, where your only job is to take orders, prepare food and serve as many customers as possible. With 150 levels to explore and over 50 dishes to serve, players can upgrade their ingredients and bar decorations, and complete achievements to become the tycoon of the best food trucks in the city.

In Flowlines VS, a classic puzzle video game for 1 or 2 players, players will compete to solve puzzles by pairing up all the matching sockets on the board with continuous lines, without crossing over other lines or branching off. With time-limited stages or a limit on moves per stage, it's a game that's easy to play, but hard to master.

Try out this bundle today and become the ultimate chef and puzzle solver!

name: Double Puzzled
description:
Two puzzle games for the entire family. Play Single player Ghost Sweeper or Rusty Spout Rescue Adventure. Rusty Spout Rescue Adventure features local two player mode so you can also challenge others.

Ghost Sweeper features eight world with 8 levels in each world with secret levels.

Rusty Spout Rescue Adventure, the most colorful puzzle game ever. Story mode, Endless mode and 2 Battle mode where you can play against a friend in local multiplayer.

name: Couch Co-Op: Urban Flow + Knights & Guns
description:
Looking for fun and addictive games to play with friends? The "Couch Co-op Bundle" is perfect for you! It includes the games:

- Urban Flow - control traffic lights in a bustling city, manipulating the flow of cars and making sure everyone gets home safely.

- Knights and Guns! - a medieval-themed action game tin which players team up as knights and fight hordes of monsters using various weapons and special abilities.

Experience a variety of gameplay experiences - "Urban Flow" is a fast-paced puzzle game, while "Knights and Guns" is an action-packed adventure. It's a great way to bring people together and have fun in a group - which makes it perfect for parties!

name: SideLine
description: SideLine is a scrolling space shooter on DOS and the first game developed by the Taiwanese studio EMAG. It was first released in Taiwan in 1996 and later saw a limited release in Poland.

name: Fall Guys: Avian Angler Pack
description: Get ready to reel 'em in with this feathery fishing bundle!

name: Meet Your Maker: Deluxe Edition
description: The Deluxe Edition includes the base game and the Scorched Necropolis Collection. Build and raid in post-apocalyptic style, or use ancient-Egyptian-inspired blocks, props, weapons, and Custodian Suits to create and infiltrate Outposts unlike any other in the wasteland.

name: Road 96: Mile 0 - Full Journey Bundle
description: The Road 96: Mile 0 - Full Journey Bundle contains the critically acclaimed Road 96 and its prequel Road 96: Mile 0.

name: The Mega FMV Bundle
description: Wales Interactive is proud to offer the Mega bundle for their very best FMV games! Featuring The Complex, Late Shift, The Bunker, The Shapeshifting Detective, The Infectious Madness of Doctor Dekker, Five Dates, Who Pressed Mute on Uncle Marcus, Bloodshore, Night Book and I Saw Black Clouds in one bundle!

name: Disney Superbia
description: In Superbia, you are in control, your place, your friends, your rules! Why not decorate your own place, make your own ice cream sundaes, pick up new clothes or just chill out in your favorite Disney Channel area!
