name: Rogue Hex
description: Craft your deck of cards to conquer the world in the Roguelite 4x. Explore mysterious lands. Survive against the barbarian horde. Expand and build dynamic cities. Discover over 200 game-changing techs. Grow your stone age empire into the stars!

name: The Solitaire Conspiracy: The Atlantis Project
description:
The Atlantis Project is a noble force of aquatic avengers, hydrated heroes and lubricated legends. They fight for the seas, and all who treat the water with respect.

Players unlock this new crew via their own FMV campaign, hosted by Alanah Pearce. Via an intriguing story, players use their powerful Submerge skill, and take it into daily challenges, countdown and skirmish modes.

name: Wade
description: A stroll along the shore of a wide river that flows into the underworld. As the player ventures deeper, the scenery starts to shift and they may encounter oddities or curiosities.

name: We Are Poems
description: A swim through the queerest region of deep space. Its inhabitants float and gravitate in bountiful joyous explosions of light, embracing the void as a place to thrive.

name: Nonno's Legend
description: A game about imagining places you’ve never seen. Nina's grandfather shows her that a globe has some magical properties—you can reshape the planet!

name: Battle Monsters
description: Battle Monsters is an early German RPG-Maker Pokémon clone by Pascal Cattarius.

name: Mine
description: A first-person game that ushers the audience into an “open-mine” and deals with the unknown relationship between raw materials and the virtual spaces that we inhabit.

name: Contact
description: A game about the search for life in the universe and identity in oneself. Players interact with onscreen interfaces to decode and understand the signals received from outer space.

name: Deep Sea Quest: Rescue the Lost Mermaid
description: Match the gems and help the lost mermaid find her way home. Watch out for the dynamite that will blow up matching gems and keep you from making the highest score. And pirate skulls will swap rows or columns of gems -- now where was that matching piece?!?! Fun game with just a little bit of frustration thrown in at the higher levels.

name: FarmVille 2: Tropic Escape
description:
Escape to an island getaway filled with adventure, mystery, and fun new mini games from the makers of FarmVille, the number one farming franchise! Play this colorful free-to-play game, now available for iPhone, iPad, and iMessage app.
Build your very own beachside inn complete with island workshops, tropical crops, and exotic animals. Farm island fruits like pineapples, coconuts, and mangos to delight your guests. Craft delicious recipes and rare goods like piña coladas, grilled fish, and flower leis.
Catch fish with Capri the dolphin and explore with Odney the playful monkey! Feed tasty treats to the cute, playful animals on your island to get unique photo ops for your guests. Story-based quests help you explore uncharted areas, learn more about your island and find rare items and goods.
Adventure unfolds all around your island!

name: Mosquito Must Die
description:
Mosquito Must Die is a minigame with lots of fun!
Hateful mosquitoes are always flying around laughing at you. It is time to start the revenge, start your mosquito killing journey right now!

name: My Talking Unicorn Emily
description:
Do you like to dress up? More clothes, more fun. Play talking unicorn games with a cute little virtual pony in this virtual pet and dress up game for kids! Dress up your unicorn in adorable costumes!
Then, while playing a talking unicorn game make sure the unicorn Emily is not hungry. Feed your unicorn pet with yummy foods: fruits, veggies, candies and snacks! And don’t forget to drink energy potion - don't waste time sleeping!
Your unicorn Emily likes to be super clean! Bathe her and enjoy unicorn funny reactions!
Play unicorn games with your talking unicorn Emily! Play coloring and decoration games with your virtual unicorn! Mini games bring coins and fun! Take good care of your magical pony pet and unlock new mini games every day!
Have fun playing My Talking Unicorn Emily!

name: Otto's Tennis game
description: One-button tennis for two players! Push the button to jump, spam the button to fly.

name: Firefly: A Myth Nerds Journey
description: You joined Firefly Chat as a way to connect with new people. What you weren’t prepared for was a distress call from a mysterious person named Jamie. With their car broken down and Firefly Chat being the only app on their phone that seems to still be working, Jamie’s life is now in your hands. Communicate in real-time with Jamie, as you help them navigate the wicked and increasingly treacherous woods of the Bridgewater Triangle. Danger and mystery lurk everywhere. Do you possess the courage to lead them to safety? Or will the cursed woods drive both of you to the brink of insanity? Whatever you choose, Jamie’s soul is in your hands.

name: Hover Biker
description: The ultimate hover simulation game for iOS. Hover Biker employs a state of the art hover simulation to immerse the player in engaging game play. The game is set in a rich city environment that is completely open for the player to explore. You are free to roam wherever the bike can take you. The game will come with a diverse set of challenges. You can use either touch controls or tilt controls to pull off some fantastic manoeuvres.

name: Cue D
description: A game based on Cue Sports, where you have to strike all the lights and then pot the ball in the hole. Each level has limited moves in which you have to complete the level, and depending upon how fast you finish, you are awarded a medal.

name: King Flames
description: Aaaaah! King Flames just switched teams and everyone’s out to burn his jersey! Help save him by moving his jersey away from the dangerous flames. It’s no easy task when the heat gets turned up. Beat your high score and unlock LeBrawn’s friends who also need your help. Save your favorite characters and reach the top of the leaderboards!

name: Tank Trace
description:
Draw terrain as you go in this exciting infinite scroller with a new twist on controls!
You control the world, not the tank! Avoid missiles, helicopters and mines. How far can you get?

name: Neon Cop
description: Drive through a neon world and catch the bad guys! Take control of the cop car as you dash, dodge and avoid obstacles! Reach the criminal and smash him out! Enjoy neon graphics, slow-mo crashes and a retro arcade feel!

name: Desert Worms
description: Colonization went fine, until They awoke. In the last steps of the evacuation you must collect the remaining research data and avoid being eaten by the giant worms. Race across the dusty planet and seek temporary refuge on cliffs and buildings from the vicious monsters.

name: E.G.L: Elephant Gay League
description: This is a single-player Fun Racer. Fly a Elephant in his UFO in a arena and avoid collisions with Walls and obstacles. Near fly-by of the sugar pices will boost your points. You are seeding peanut as you fly. This game is a absurd fun racer with the strangest sound track that you might have ever heard.

name: Electric Enigma VR
description: An electrifying puzzle game that will test your problem-solving skills and your understanding of physics

name: 4 Seasons Runner
description: Avoid the obstacles by jumping over them and beat your own highscore.

name: Car Delivery Man
description: Immerse yourself in the era of the 90s, driving cars of those years. Become a driver who delivers cars to different countries.

name: Escape the Unknown: Awaken the Realm
description: Awaken the Realm is a fantasy RPG visual novel where you explore various dungeons to solve puzzles and fight enemies in a quest to uncover your identity and save the kingdom!

name: Crusader Kings III: Legacy of Persia
description: Legacy of Persia lets you relive the dramatic struggle for survival and empire in the lands between the Euphrates and the Indus. This Flavor Pack introduces new systems for Clan government rulers, and expands on the Islamic and Zoroastrian religions dominant in the region at the time.

name: The World of Pirates
description: Welcome in this simulation-action game of "The World of Pirates" where you take the role of a pirate battling to take over the sea.

name: Poly Jigsaw: Butterflies
description: Poly Jigsaw: Butterflies is a traditional style jigsaw puzzle game, with a cute butterflies.

name: Cat Rescue
description: Cat Rescue is a casual 2D Platformer game about a cat finding it's way back home. Can YOU complete the journey?

name: Fourteen Fiends
description: Fourteen Fiends is a single player fantasy action adventure card game!

name: Upside Town
description:
The townspeople are alarmed: the wicked witch has been seen riding about on her broom, casting her vicious spells and turning the town upside down. Only the good magician Arthur can undo her evil conjurations – but he’s nowhere to be found! Can you locate Arthur and help turn the town right side up again?

The player controls a small boy who attempts to find the good magician, exploring various locations around town to find helpful clues and objects; woven into the plot are several puzzles and mini-games designed to develop coordination, memorization and graphical/musical skills.

The cursor changes shape to indicate objects of interest, and there’s simple click/drag inventory system. The mini-puzzles vary in difficulty, according to the chosen skill level.

name: War Mongrels: Renegade Edition
description: War Mongrels is an isometric real-time tactics game that takes place on the eastern front of World War II. Its story-driven campaign takes inspiration in the grim events that actually took place and the real stories that arose from them.

name: Below: Special Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Gakuen Handsome Fighters
description: Gakuen Handsome Fighters is a single-player 2D action game. The handsome boys fight using punches, kicks, and special moves.

name: Riddles And Sieges
description: Riddles & Sieges is a medieval puzzle game where you use old siege weapons to solve puzzles. Your goal is to destroy the castle and for that you are given sets of different buildings with their own quirks and timings.

name: Octopath Traveler II: Steelbook Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The Jackbox Party Pack 10
description: Become a party legend! The celebrated franchise returns with epic drawing battles in Tee K.O. 2, chaotic type-offs in FixyText, time-travel trivia in Timejinx, hidden identity intrigue in Hypnotorious, and group music-making in Dodo Re Mi.

description: Battle strange beasts and brave the elements to stay alive in Song in the Smoke: Rekindled, a spectacular PlayStation VR2 remaster of the award-winning VR survival game set in a world outside of time.

Chronicles Edition Includes:

• Hammerwatch: Anniversary Edition Base Game
• Anniversary Pack: 20 Additional Colors to Choose from, 2 Additional Voice Packs, 5 Additional Hero Facial Items

name: Toon Tumble
description: "Toon Tumble" is a side-scrolling runner game with beautiful graphics. The game adopts a cartoon-style screen, and players need to jump continuously, pass through various organs and obstacles, and finally reach the end point.

name: Heroes of Loot: Gauntlet of Power
description: A randomly generated action RPG shooter with heavy Rogue-like elements. Mow down thousands of dungeon dwelling creatures and survive as you descent deeper into the dungeon! Enhancing your Gauntlet of Power with new and upgraded weapons.

name: Hard to Make a Romantic Cartoon!

name: Text Twist 3
description: Complete dictionaries and thousands of levels for English, German, Italian, Russian, Portuguese, Swedish, Spanish, Turkish, Dutch, and, French languages. You can use your touch screen or a mouse to play the game.

name: Zombie jokers 2
description: Zombie jokers 2 is an arcade game where you have to survive in different locations with zombie ! You can improve the speed of your character, as well as buy him a more powerful gun! Each time, the number of zombies increases. In the game you will have to shoot different zombies.

name: Ascendant.com
description: Ascendant is a squad-based tactical FPS with serious balls. Each match is different, with game-changing events and adrenaline-fueled battles. Set in a dynamic BioPunk world where everything wants to kill you; fight to extract resources, and get out with more than just your dignity.

name: AI Story Quest
description: An Illustrated and Narrated AI Dungeon Master. An interactive storybook for an immersive ChatGPT experience. Get your own personal storybook, or try it out for free.

name: Johnny Rocketfingers
description: Johnny Rocketfingers is a point-and-click adventure game that gives you control over Johnny Rocketfingers, the most "suppish" guy around. In this game, you help out a mom trying to find her daughter. Use anything around you that you deem necessary to finish your objective in each area you're thrown in.

name: Johnny Rocketfingers 2
description: Johnny Rocketfingers 2 is a point-and-click adventure game that lets you play as Johnny Rocketfingers, the toughest, bravest, strongest guy around. This time, you will have to find who's out to get you, and give them a little visit. Pick up items, combine them, and use your wit to get to the bottom of the mystery that you've been roped into in Johnny Rocketfingers 2.

name: Bakken: Ski Jumping
description: Bakken: Ski Jumping is a winter sports simulation game. To go for gold you have to jump as high as possible, you have to fly as long as possible and you mustn't forget the telemark landing!

name: Captain Toad: Treasure Tracker
description: Nintendo 3DS port of Captain Toad: Treasure Tracker.

name: Captain Toad: Treasure Tracker
description: Captain Toad stars in his own puzzling quest on the Nintendo Switch system! Our stubby hero must dodge dangers and track treasures across many trap-filled courses. Survive smoldering volcanoes, hazardous steam engines, haunted houses, and even new courses based on the Super Mario Odyssey game! Luckily, a second player can join in by tossing turnips at enemies.

name: Super DGR World
description: A Super Mario World romhack.

name: Strange Flesh
description:
Welcome to Strange Flesh: a sexy, gay, adult beat 'em up game from Greatest Bear Studios.

You play the role of The Bartender, a master of the hypnotic arts and a servant of the bar, Strange Flesh. In the game, you'll infiltrate the mind of Joe, one of the bar's many troubled patrons and help him out however you see fit. Pummel your enemies into submission, corrupt them with your hypnotic smoke, or recruit them to your side. The choice is yours.

Strange Flesh is pretty short, just about 30 minutes long, but features three endings, lavish animation, and a killer soundtrack. Strange Flesh won the Melbourne Queer Games Festival Gold Medal in 2018!

name: Doki Doki Mario 64
description:
Have you ever wanted to date all the enemies of the Mario Universe?
In this game, Mario visits the local high school to conquest the hearts of various characters seen around the Mushroom Kingdom!

name: Rumbleverse: Season Two
description: Rumbleverse Season Two is live! The bridge is open, and the champions of Grapital City are battling it out at the all-new sunny sites of Low Key Key.

name: The Stig IV
description: A Slovak text adventure recently re-released in English based around the subject of computer hacking and system penetration. It is an unofficial sequel to The Stig 3, by Fuxoft and there is important info that can help a user in this game. The story takes place in the (then) near future of 1991 in New York. You play as Tim Coleman, a programmer\hacker and your job is to hack Jack Ragger and clean out his accounts.

name: Super Luke Kart
description: Super Luke Kart is a rom hack of Super Mario Kart which adds new tracks and battle arenas, new drivers, and more.

name: Saziri
description:
The purpose of the game is to collect and repair the parts of the heavy magnetic force confinement shuttle divided into eight, and to seal the source core of "SA / ZI / RI" again.

The player can also get into JRPG battles with enemies if they so desire.

name: Super Cooks
description:
A parody of Golvellius II released in 1989 on the Disc Station Special #2.
You play as the character Kelesis who enters the world of cooking. You must
learn the culinary arts in five stages, and get 4 degrees before facing Golvellius.
You will find Randar, who is there to restore your vitality. Your starting weapon
is the frying pan, but you will get new ones in your quest.

name: Lil' Guardsman
description: Imagine you're a 12 year old, suddenly in charge of the guard shed at the castle gate, where you decide if elves, goblins and 100+ other characters should be admitted. It's a wonderful combination of deduction, narrative and puzzle games.

name: Heartland
description: Heartland is a Doom II episode developed exclusively for the Eternity Engine. Heartland takes place in the nation's decaying industrial heartland. An inscrutable evil lurks somewhere beneath the abandoned factory on the city's outskirts, beckoning you closer with every beat of your heart...

name: Chataclysm
description:
Legend has it that there is a treasure trove of great loot and riches. The fortune is said to lie at the very top of a perilous climb. However, all those that have tried have been pulled down by an evil monster. The monster known as........ chat
Welcome to the game where chat directly affects the player. And can only be WON with a chat alliance. Every chat message will try to stop your journey to the top.

name: Ninja Gaiden Sigma 2 Black
description: A mod that rebalances the difficulty in Ninja Gaiden Sigma 2 to something closer to the original 2008 version of Ninja Gaiden II

name: Neji-Shiki
description: Neji-Shiki (or Screw Style) is an adventure game loosely based on the 1968 alternative manga of the same name by Yoshiharu Tsuge. Despite the name, the game adapts the events from several of Tsuge's manga stories.

name: Robot Ponkottsu: Moon Version
description: Robot Ponkottsu: Moon Version is a Role-Playing game, published by Hudson, which was released in Japan in 1999.

name: Hakuoki: Kyoto Winds - Deluxe Edition
description:
Includes:
- Hakuoki: Kyoto Winds
- Winds Treasure Box DLC: A collection of six previously-untold stories.
- OST: 20 tracks to immerse yourself in the battles fought and the emotions felt in Kyoto.
- Event Scene Collection: 17 pages of gorgeous event scenes.
- PC Wallpaper: Add some beauty to your screen with 4 wallpapers.
- Mobile Wallpaper: Protect your mobile device with any 12 of your favorite bachelors.
- Character Art Collection: 13 pages showing rough sketches and full-color artwork of the beautiful characters.

name: Hakuoki SSL: Sweet School Life for Nintendo Switch
description:
Spring, a season of blessing for new encounters. Yukimura Chizuru knocks on the gates of a private academy, which has since been a boys' school. However, as of this year, Hakuou Academy opens its gates to co-education and Chizuru is the only female student enrolled. Thus, begins her first year.

This edition comes with cards and some other extras.

name: Primal Planet
description: Primal Planet is an action-packed Metroidvania that combines survival and roleplaying elements with a pixel-perfect aesthetic and an engaging story, and it’s all taking place on a lush planet filled with dinosaurs!

name: Kirby's Dream World
description:
Kirby's Dream World is a fan made virtual community where fans of the Kirby series can create their own character, hang out with friends, chat and discuss a verity of topics, and explore an open world in a MMORPG style. It is completely fan made, with original gameplay, areas to explore, and quests and activities to complete, and in no way reflects the games or gameplay found in Nintendo and Hal's Kirby series--this is a fan made community for fans of the series, and not a Kirby game.

In Kirby's Dream World you create your own character and enter the world of Dream World. Once you are in the game you will be able to meet fans from all over the world, and play with them. The idea of this virtual community sandbox is to make your dreams come true. By playing and being active, you will not only be able to play with other Kirby fans, but you will be able to affect the game its self and shape it into your own dreams.

name: Mass Effect
description: A remaster of the original Mass Effect included in the Mass Effect: Legendary Edition bundle.

name: Secret Pet Playmate
description: Unleash your inner fighter and take on the role of the school's most feared delinquent! No one tells you what to do—until the quietest girl in your class discovers your secret passion for writing and illustrating! The two of you join forces to keep your stories safe and explore a world of trust and obedience together. Will you be able to keep up your tough exterior while becoming someone's pet?

name: The Farmer Was Replaced
description: Program and optimize a drone to automate a farm and watch it do the work for you. Collect resources to unlock better technology and become the most efficient farmer in the world. Improve your problem solving and coding skills.

name: Echo Point Nova
description: Satisfying first person combat meets classic adventure game. Featuring singleplayer and online co-op. By the creators of Severed Steel.

name: Overwatch 2: Season 4 - Space Opera
description:
Blossom onto the battlefield with our newest Support Hero Lifeweaver, progress through the Battle Pass to earn rewards including Mythic Galactic Emperor Sigma, and fight for your faction when The Watchers and The Infinite Empire clash in the Starwatch event!

Explore Talantis, the first-ever map made in collaboration with the community.

Enjoy major quality-of-life updates with a revamped Competitive experience.

name: Heli War
description: Heli War is an arcade shooter game that takes place after the Russian War in 1962, a period of violence ensues, the victims are your own townspeople, and your mission is to destroy the enemy before he destroys you.

name: Fire Breathers
description: A multiplayer-only shooter released in Action 52.

name: Star Evil
description:
Star Evil is the second game of NES version of Action 52.

It's the first game on the cartridge that has a space theme, which is a common theme in the list of games. A lot of these share the same code for the boss and the way you play the game.

name: Illuminator
description: A game featured in Action 52 in which the player must navigate a dark screen that only lights up briefly after defeating an enemy.

name: G-Force Fighters
description:
G-Force is the fourth game of NES version of Action 52 and the second shooter game.
The objective of the player is the same of Star Evil. The player needs destroy enemies , reach the end of level and defeat the boss.

name: Cheetahmen
description: The Cheetahmen was the most marketed game in the Action 52 compilation.

name: Moon Minions
description: Moon Minions is a currently lost old Scott Cawthon game released in 2004. some information we know from old Daily Click reviews and articles, we know the game was about a RPG where you can take control of a moonman and his minions on a robot infested planet and must try and destroy a interstellar dark energy called the "Phantom Core".

name: Lemmings 2: The Tribes
description: This port of Lemmings 2 sees the graphics stay mostly the same, with only some slight downgrades in quality and performance due to the less powerful hardware. Matt Furniss composed the new music which is just the original music rescored for the Genesis, and sounds substantially different due to the different soundcards and lesser sampling support.

name: Legacy of Flan
description: Legacy of Flan is the first game in the Legacy of Flan series and is one of Scott's very first games ever to be released. It's an RPG game centered around little slime creatures known as "Flan" which you can change the species of with flan flavors you find after beating monsters where you must stop whoever's giving your species such a horrible name.

name: Junkyard Apocalypse
description: Junkyard Apocalypse is a fire of action and online platforms made by Scott Cawthon in 2004.

name: The Legend of White Whale
description:
Legend of White Whale is a role-playing game that focuses on a group of three mushroom friends on a quest to find "The White Whale," the legendary ship that brought their ancestors into the world.

The village of Mushsnail is starting to dry up, and that would mean certain death for everyone who lives there. Frup-Foo (our hero) believes that if the mythical White Whale exists, he can keep the secret of a new beginning. But there is an evil afoot. Now that Mushsnail is starting to dry up, he has been left vulnerable to monsters that previously couldn't enter the magic barrier. With each passing day, the village becomes more at risk.

White Whale features turn-based rpg battles and an aerial world map. Each character has their own abilities, of course. Priss is the healer as well as the state spell caster. Frup is slower than the others, but has a powerful special attack and is the only character who can use items during battle. Chup is the fighter, and he can only ... well... fight!

The game progresses in chapters. Each chapter takes place in the same world, just with a different goal.

name: Chup's Quest
description: The sequel of the game The Legend of White Whale.

name: Bogart
description: Bogart is one of many games by Scott Cawthon. It was created in 2006 and is a action based game.

name: Evil of Demons: Algailah
description:
Evil of Demons: Algailah is a survival horror game, hiding and escaping, where the hero is kidnapped by a demon at noon the hero wakes up and finds himself somewhere underground, tries to get out of the predicament by finding keys and collecting the statues to open the exit door, you must have to hide from the devil and sneak away from him so that he can survive. Along the way there will be obstacles and places to hide.
While you try to escape from the demon home you will explore the fearsome cellar of the Demon
Reveal some facts.

name: Bogart 2: Return of Bogart
description: Bogart 2: Return of Bogart is a platform video game made by Scott Cawthon in 2006.

name: Rune Worth: Kokui no Kikoushi
description: A 1990 RPG by T&E Soft.

name: M.o.o.n.
description: M.O.O.N. is another old Scott Cawthon game. It's a RPG game that takes place in space.

name: Parkour Annovation: Unreal Edition
description: Parkour Annovation is a game that shallenges you to traverse obstacles in a dynamic and realists environment using parkour skills such as running jumping climbing You san explore different locations from urban landscapes to natural settings, and face various challenges that rest your speed agility and creativity Parkour Annovation is a same that lets you experience the thrill and freedom of parkour in a virtual world

name: Software Tycoon: Der Spielemanager
description:
Software Tycoon puts you in the role of a game studio CEO. You start out in the 1980s, where you hire your first employees and develop your first games and research new technologies and genres to create even better games.
Besides a free-style mode without any goal, the game does feature various scenarios.

A spiritual successor to the game was released under the name of Mad Games Tycoon by two of the main developers of the original game: Stefan and Christian Pohl.

name: Slumberfish!
description: Slumberfish! is a Puzzle game where you need to find the right path to the finish line.

name: Days of the Divine
description:
Long ago, in a valley where a small village lay, two deities fought each other. One was imprisoned, the other vanished. Yet some time ago, an unnatural mist began lingering in the village, dissolving people's memories.

Biyu, a young shrine maiden, is now working her hardest in the shrine of one of these deities in the faint hope the mist will one day dissolve. Even though her good friend also lost his memory, not all hope is lost; she meets a stranger who seems to be recovering from his memory loss, and rather quickly as well...

- Description from the games original post on the Lemmasoft forums

name: Golden Galaxy
description:
Golden Galaxy is a game made by Scott Cawthon.
Released in 2013 for Android devices, Golden Galaxy features levels, enemies and characters from The Desolate Hope. The game can be downloaded for free on the Google Play store or App Store. The Windows version can also be purchased on Amazon.

name: Forever Quester
description: Forever Quester is your quest companion, playing the rpg that you just don't have the time to play while you're living your own life. When you turn your phone on and check the game, your hero will update you on what you've missed. Help him choose weapons, armors, mounts and professions, and check back often to see how he is progressing! Guide him as he seeks out the evil Xaxoor on a quest that could very well go on forever!

name: Pimp My Dungeon
description: This time, Dracula is playing with power! Once again the vampire hunters are charging into Dracula's castle! (You can imagine how upset Dracula must be.) In this Tower-Defense game, help Dracula prepare his dungeon to face the attack of vampire hunters!

name: My Demonic Romance
description:
My Demonic Romance is a Visual Novel with a twist...
Sure you're playing a typically geeky guy with classes to attend, a job that sucks and a love life that's DOA.

But the difference is that when the cute, exciting and adventurous girl shows up, she's an actual demon, with horns, a pointed tail and a sex-drive to match!

As that guy you have to navigate your daily life while trying to keep your new demonic companion safe in a world that's completely new to her and not to mention handling the fact that she's not at all shy when it comes to her physical desires too!

You take on the role of Adam, a guy studying hard to get the grades he needs to succeed in life, working a part-time job to pay the bills, and all the time longing for some meaningful female companionship - who gets more than he bargained for when Lily, a succubus summoned from hell itself turns up in his life.

name: Use Holy Water!
description: The undead are on a rampage and the only thing stopping them is you, a shotgun, and a few bottles of holy water! (well yes you also get shurikens, lightning, and acid rain) Featuring five difficulty settings and two gameplay modes, Use Holy Water is a great way to kill some time by killing some zombies!

name: 20 Useless Apps
description: Yes, 20 Useless Apps, from an egg-laying simulator to a scanner that counts the bacteria on your finger! This all-in-one useless app collection has it all! See what it's like to be dead using the death simulator! Witness breakthrough cliff-jumping A.I. technology! This useless collection has it all!

name: Cropple
description: Plant carrots, lettuce, eggplants, onions, and melons in this colorful puzzle game! Line up your crops in vertical or horizontal rows to clear them! When all of your crops are harvested and your weeds and gophers are gone, you've won!

name: Fantasia: The Realm of Thanos
description:
"Please save Fantasia!" a woman asked you. She's in front of you, a lonely girl who does not have anyone, asking you to save an unknown world from an impending doom by obtaining a heart key from one of four "heart bearers"

The first one is a Demon Lord....
The second is a bloodthirsty assassin...
The third is a mysterious hooded guy...
And the fourth... has curse placed on him...

name: Pogoduck
description: See how far you can pogo your duck! Touch the screen to pogo, and collect stars for speed boosts!

name: Gemsa
description: In this fast-paced puzzle game, line up gemstones in horizontal rows for points and added time; but it's not that simple! Each level demands a different color of gemstone! Drag your finger across unwanted gems and they will shatter, leaving the good ones to fall into place. Stack them for big combos and big points! Watch for special items as well; touching a "B" symbol will destroy all gems of the same color that you touched. Touching a "C" symbol will convert gems of the color you touched into the color for that level!

name: Fart Hotel
description: Fart Hotel is a mobile game made by Scott Cawthon in 2014.

name: Chubby Hurdles
description: Clear three mighty hurdles to beat the game!

name: Shell Shatter
description:
It's a shell of a game!

Get ready for some fast-paced shell breaking action! Drag your finger across unwanted dirt tiles to make them crumble, letting your shimmering shells fall into place! Line them up in horizontal rows for points and more time! Touch a "B" icon to destroy all blocks of that color. Touch a "C" icon to turn all blocks of that color into shells!

name: Kitty in the Crowd
description: Select from three difficulty settings then scan the crowd for nine kitties who could be hiding anywhere! Play again and the kitties will be in new hiding places! Fun for everyone!

name: The Exile of Aphrodisia
description:
The Exile of Aphrodisia is a transformation-themed game inspired by The Odyssey and The Oregon Trail.

One thousand years ago, the first humans crossed through a mysterious portal into a new magical world and settled on the island continent known as Aphrodisia. Now, however, humanity has just lost a war against the powerful Demon Empire and is being hunted down as slaves.

The last remaining hope for freedom is the ruined city of Niu Heym where, with any luck, at least some of your wards will be able to return to the humans' ancestral homeworld before the portal-gate closes for another thousand years.

You are an elf guide tasked with leading a small party of humans over a thousand kilometers west across all of Aphrodisia to the city of Niu Heym and the Portal Gate. With any luck, at least some of your wards will be able to return to the humans' ancestral homeworld before the portal gate runs out of rift charges. It is your job to try and get them there, but forces are acting against you, wishing to take some, or all, of your charges and to transform or enslave them.

This will be a long and dangerous trek… and you may not walk out on the same two feet! Are you up to the challenge?

name: Dark Prisms
description: In this strategic gem puzzle, drag your finger across unwanted gemstones so that the rest can fall into place and make complete horizontal lines. Make a row of red gems for added time and points, or match blue and green gems to receive special gem-busting items! Purple gems can't be removed by touching them, so you'll have to use your special items to clear them from the playing field! Time drains faster as you progress through the levels!

name: Paimordle
description: Paimordle is a Genshin Impact themed version of Wordle.

name: Microsoft Combat Flight Simulator: WWII Europe Series
description: A cancelled port of Microsoft Combat Flight Simulator: WWII Europe Series for the Sega Dreamcast.

name: New Super Mario Bros. Versus: Steve's Map Pack
description: A mod containing verious custom made maps for New Super Mario Bros. Multiplayer.

name: Wicket Cricket Manager
description: Sin descripción

name: New Super Mario Bros. Versus: Cubby's Character Mod
description: A mod of New Super Mario Bros. Versus that added a variety of new character options and stages.

name: Cookies Inc.
description: Cookie clicker auto idle game.

name: Save The Dog
description: Save The Dog is a casual puzzle game. You draw lines with your fingers to create walls that protect the dog from attacks by bees in the hive. You need to protect the dog with the painted wall for 10 seconds during the attack of the bees, hold on and you will win the game. Use your brain to save the doge.

name: Idle Dungeon Tycoon
description: Become a real dungeon tycoon by managing your heroes and idle profit and defeat enough monsters to improve your heroes in this simulation game!

name: Idle Pixel Heroes
description: Idle Pixel Heroes is an idle game where you merge and upgrade stunning heroes to beat monsters. Collect and merge cute pets to increase your stats and become the best player in the rankings.

name: Microgames Jam Pak
description:
The result of the Gameboy Microgames Jam from November of 2022, Microgames Jam Pak is every WarioWario-style microgame combined together into a symbol game for the original Gameboy.

Play 20 original microgames made by the community, and compete to get the highest score.

name: Lemmings 2: The Tribes
description: This port of Lemmings 2: The Tribes features very similar graphics to the original release, and otherwise plays just about the same. The only differences come via some slight performance downgrades and the soundtrack composed by Mike Clarke which is just a rescored version of the original works made for the SNES soundchip. It also has an easter egg where, if you plug the Super Scope into port two, you can use it to blast the Lemmings.

name: Lemmings 2: The Tribes
description: This Port of Lemmings 2: The Tribes was a Japanese exclusive that saw virtually no changes other than the greatly increased music quality.

name: Idle Universe: Offline Miner MOD
description: Mod of Idle Universe: Planet Miner for offline play and infinite money

name: The Runic Conjecture
description: The Runic Conjecture is a magical puzzle game about experimenting and learning the meaning of mysterious runes. What may seem like Magic now is merely a Science that you have yet to understand.

name: Tower Gun: Zombie Shooter 3D
description: The zombie army has taken over the entire castle. The last tower remained in which all the survivors found refuge. Don't let the zombies break into the last shelter!

name: Farm Slider
description:
Easy to play, challenging to finish and impossible to put down.

Hours and hours of puzzling fun for all ages. Challenge your ability to think ahead in our new, minimalistic puzzle game. The game contains lots of levels with pictures of farm towns and roads,
but: they’re out of place! Slide the tiles to match the example above to complete the level.

Some may seem impossible at first, but we promise: they CAN all be done!

48 brainteasing levels
No ads, no in-app purchases

name: Pokémon Bizarre
description: Pokémon Bizarre is a Spanish-language fangame created by developer MrGrossi, also author of District Dance Battle, Motor Casa Paco, Vaya Canicastañazos, Mauriçius Nativitatem, FDI, A Toda Pastilla and Louse on the Loose. You will give life to a character who has been forced to explore the quirky and amazing Pokemon region known as Quintueles. In the process you can train up to eight generations of Pokémon, visit eight different gyms, meet new stupid characters and embark on a multitude of missions that involve things such as going to a rave, fight malicious octopuses and chit-chat with the famous "Alien Fumeta".

name: New Heights
description: New Heights is a physics-based climbing and bouldering game.

name: Wynncraft
description: Wynncraft is fully-featured MMORPG Minecraft server.

name: Pokémon Sphynx
description:
Pokémon Sphynx is a Spanish-language fangame created by Angeleiro, also author of some Pokémon fangames like Vinyl: Mystery Solver or Sunny! Sunny! Fangame Parade.
You will incarnate Riley or Roy, the quiet protagonist(s), alongside the cheerful artist Hilda, the stupidest being alive Luka and the shy policeman Blu. This unusual group will enbark on a journey through Arkan to close the access to the dark world of Mirroria, meeting some wacky characters along their way.

name: Pokémon Emerald Randomizer
description: A randomizer mod for Pokémon Emerald.

name: The Return to Bloody Nights
description: Get ready for a spine-tingling lore focused experience with our new fnaf fan game, "Return to Bloody Nights." Inspired by FNaF Plus, the original 4 FNaF games, and the books by Scott Cawthon, this game takes its own unique twist on the timeline and crucial events of the Five Nights at Freddy's series. With a combination of old-style atmosphere and gameplay, along with new mechanics, our game brings the best elements of the official games to the table. It's a reborn version of our previous game, "Bloody Nights at Freddy's."

name: Project Spark: Conker's Big Reunion
description: Sin descripción

name: Koneko Mo Issho
description:
Koneko Mo Issho is a Video Game developed by Bomber Express and published by Sony Computer Entertainment Inc. It was released on January 27, 2000 for the PlayStation, and is the second game in the Doko Demo Issyo Series.

An expansion of the previous game aimed at a younger audience, it features Toro Inoue as a kitten and serves as a prequel of Doko Demo Issyo. It is an add-on disc, meaning save data for Doko Demo Issyo is required on the PlayStation in order to play it.

name: I Modo Mo Issho
description:
i Modo Mo Issho (iモードもいっしょ) is a video game developed by Bomber Express and published by Sony Computer Entertainment Inc. It was released on May 24, 2001 for the PlayStation, and it is the third game and an expansion pack for Doko Demo Issyo and Koneko Mo Issho in the Doko Demo Issyo Series.

Like Koneko Mo Issho, save data for Doko Demo Issyo is required to play it. It features additional content, such as new environments and music.

It's most notable feature is its connection with the i-Mode phone service, a Japanese mobile phone service provided by DoCoMo that allowed an early form of Internet connectivity with mobile phones. Players can use an adapter to connect the phone to the Playstation console and connect to the online service, which allows players to to communicate to other players and the Pokepi, similar to the PocketStation.

It is also the last Doko Demo Issyo game to be released exclusively on the PlayStation. The online service ended on December 15th, 2002, but the offline features of the game were still available.

name: Wanna-Be a Dino Finder
description: Help Dr. Rock Hound dig for fossils and learn some fun facts about dinosaurs and prehistoric eras. You can also play dinosaur-themed mini-games with anthropomorphic animals Addie, Katie and Rufus. Part of edutainment series of games.

name: Junkbot Undercover
description: The sequel to Junkbot. It is a Shockwave puzzle-platformer that was hosted on the official LEGO website in 2002. The player must place LEGO bricks to form paths and stairways so Junkbot can reach and consume all the recycling bins in a level. The game introduces lasers as a new hazard, as well as various other new elements such as moving blocks and teleportation pads.

name: Lobby Loitering
description: Have you ever felt like, in a single step, the world around you changed, and you didn't notice until it was too late? Explore a collection of alternate realities in an attempt to get Marcel back to the reality he belongs in.

name: Pixel Tribe: Viking Kingdom
description: Pixel Tribe: Viking Kingdom is a strategy RPG with retro pixel art graphics where you build and upgrade a tribe of Vikings.

name: Futuructa: Merge the Future
description: A brilliant scientist Kiana created Futuructa – a computer-simulated reality designed to help people get smart like never before.

name: Roland Garros French Open 2002
description: Roland Garros French Open 2002 is a tennis game developed by Caparace. The player can choose between 10 different players to play in 4 tournaments that includes Roland Garros and the US Open.

name: Rune Coliseum
description: A deck-building roguelike game with unique semi-real-time combat system. Step into the shoes of an ancient gladiator and do your best to survive in the coliseum. Combine various skills and equipment, develop your own fighting style, and defeat all the enemies to become the next champion!

name: Devil's Dive
description: Devil's Dive is an action platformer rogue-lite. Dive deeper and deeper into the depths to regain your title as Lord of the Underworld... if you can defeat the usurpers! Death will see you spat out, returned to the surface. But you may Dive again, stronger!

name: Block & Balls
description: A 2D arcade-ish physics based game in which you can play fun, creative, challenging and extremely difficult levels, create your own levels or compete against your friends and players around the globe or try some experimental gamemodes in the arcade! Block & Balls has all this and more!

name: Temporal Shore
description: A unique blend of roguelike deckbuilding and survival strategy, where you control your characters only with your cards. You not only play your actions, but also decide who to perform them. Can you break the time loop and lead your team to safety, or will you die trying?

name: Dino Dash Party
description: Dino Dash Party is a fast paced 4 player casual couch co-op/party game where you throw bombs, collect food and try to stay alive. Work together or compete against each other in a variety of minigames, add modifiers to change your game or try out our crazy wacky stages in our challenge mode

name: Hitman Party
description: Get ready to join the ultimate hitman party - a fast-paced and hilarious local multiplayer game for up to 6 players. Can you blend in with the crowd, outsmart your friends, and be the first to hunt down the target? Experience the thrill of multiple game modes with your friends!

name: Sentinels of Earth-Prime
description: Control a new team of heroes battling evil villains across dynamic environments. Play out epic comic book battles come to life in this exciting adaptation of the hit card game.

name: Lost Artifacts: Mysterious Book
description:
The team of experienced treasure hunters rushes again to meet adventures!
During a regular inventory at the museum, archaeologist Claire comes across an unfamiliar book with a mysterious lock-puzzle adorned with precious stones.
After unsuccessful attempts to open the book, the girl, in anger, presses a strange mechanism, and all the stones from it fall out immediately!
The museum room quickly changes into a forest with giant trees - the book has taken Claire and the team to its world.
Will the brave treasure hunter be able to find the lost stones and return home?
Embark on a heroic mission with Claire - quench your thirst for adventure and help her find all the stones!
Convenient controls and clear training will help you easily get into the basics of the game.
Embark on an exciting journey through the world of the Enigmatic Book!

name: Arcade Archives: Rezon
description:
Set on Earth during an extraterrestrial invasion, players take control of an SR-91 fighter ship equipped with a VAWS (Variable Armor & Weapon System) and take on the invaders.
Pick up items and equip Arms, a key feature that gives you the ability to attack behind you or block enemy shots when used well.

name: Project Apidom
description: Project Apidom combines MOBA and RPG gameplay in a post-apocalyptic world. Build your character, scavenge, and fight in arena battles to become an unstoppable force while breaking the norms of usual MOBA games.

name: Dynablaster
description: Having been a blockbuster, Dynablaster is a game for the strategic thinker whose smart tactics will instill fear in his competitors – playing online or local against others or against the computer. In this captivating action game, destroy your enemies with cleverly placed bombs.

name: Christmas Squirt!
description: Christmas Squirt! - is an awesome, animated, relaxing game where sexy elf girls help you have an unforgettable Christmas night. See if you can bring the lusty girls to squirt!

name: Strip'Em III
description: Strip'Em III is the latest installment in the Strip'Em series, a unique blend of poker and sexual content graphics.

name: TWS: Training and War Simulation
description: Training & War Simulation is a Global Combat Simulator featuring air, land, sea simulation & AI spanning the entire Earth. Players experience an ultra realistic simulation from first person, third person, & from a strategic command level.

name: Gym Manager
description: Gym Manager is a simulation game where you can build, expand and manage your own gym. To attract more customers, invest in new equipment and sabotage your competition. But beware: the town's shady streets provide opportunities for illegal business ventures.

name: Cult of Personality
description: Cult of Personality is an upcoming Social Deception Game that bends the rules of what players can see, do, and hear... In life, and death!

name: Grim Tides
description: A traditional RPG adventure, set in a detailed fantasy world with abundance of writen lore. Inspired by the classics of the genre, it tries to evoke both the simplicity and complexity associated with early RPG games, and can be played in short bursts of just a few minutes, or for hours at a time.

name: Techbrawlogy: Into the RoboDome
description: Techbrawlogy: Into the RoboDome is a multiplayer split-screen beat 'em up with cartoon-styled characters. Players can cooperate with their team to fight robots, charging up their super meters to perform powerful attacks while doing so.

name: Journey to Natsai
description: Start a journey toward the mythical place Natsai in this strategic roguelike deck building game. Predict your opponents while playing three moves into the future, Obtain powerful cards and items, and reach Natsai!

name: Zombie Exterminator
description: Zombie exterminator is a top-down shooter roguelite where you play a soldier wielding up to 4 weapons which consist of 3 different parts stock body and core. Fight against zombies and horrendous creatures. Choose different upgrades, weapons, parts and relics. Create unique builds and weapons.

name: Cease To Breathe
description: Cease to Breathe is retro-inspired adventure heavily influenced by the Commodore Amiga games of the late 1980's / early 90's.

name: Melon Knight
description: Tiny little adventure with roguelike elements, where your next step decides everything. Fight your way through a dungeon full of monsters, bats and bugs. Find a magic book and save the Kingdom of Lei! (or destroy it). Retro style!

name: Dog's World
description: A surreal, menu driven, pseudo-immersive sim without rhyme or reason - What's the point? What am I supposed to be doing? Is it supposed to look like this? The answer to all these questions is yes.
